summary.en: Learn use cases and prompts for any role.
summary.zh: 学习适用于任何角色的用例和提示词。

description.en: ChatGPT supports creating drafts, polishing copy, and adapting everyday workplace communications.
description.zh: ChatGPT 支持创建草稿、润色文案和调整日常工作沟通。

prompt.en: Write a professional email to [recipient]. The email is about [topic] and should be polite, clear, and concise. Provide a subject line and a short closing.
prompt.zh: 撰写一封发送给 [收件人] 的专业邮件。邮件主题是 [主题],语气应礼貌、清晰、简洁。请提供邮件主题行和简短的结尾。

prompt.en: Rewrite the following text so it is easier to understand. The text will be used in a professional setting. Ensure the tone is clear, respectful, and concise. Text: [paste text].
prompt.zh: 改写以下文本使其更易于理解。文本将用于专业场合。确保语气清晰、尊重和简洁。文本:[粘贴文本]。

prompt.en: Reframe this message for [audience type: executives, peers, or customers]. The message was originally written for [context]. Adjust tone, word choice, and style to fit the intended audience. Text: [paste text].
prompt.zh: 为 [受众类型:高管、同事或客户] 重新编写此消息。该消息最初是为 [背景] 编写的。调整语气、措辞和风格以适应目标受众。文本:[粘贴文本]。

prompt.en: Draft a meeting invitation for a session about [topic]. The meeting will include [attendees/roles] and should outline agenda items, goals, and preparation required. Provide the text in calendar-invite format.
prompt.zh: 为关于 [主题] 的会议起草邀请函。会议将包括 [参会者/角色],应列出议程项目、目标和所需准备。以日历邀请格式提供文本。

prompt.en: Summarize this email thread into a short recap. The thread includes several back-and-forth messages. Highlight key decisions, action items, and open questions. Email: [paste text].
prompt.zh: 将此邮件线程总结为简短摘要。线程包含多个来回消息。突出关键决策、行动项和未解决问题。邮件:[粘贴文本]。

description.en: ChatGPT helps streamline preparation, note-taking, and follow-up.
description.zh: ChatGPT 帮助简化准备、记录和跟进工作。

prompt.en: Create a structured agenda for a meeting about [topic]. The meeting will last [time] and include [attendees]. Break the agenda into sections with time estimates and goals for each section.
prompt.zh: 为关于 [主题] 的会议创建结构化议程。会议将持续 [时间] 并包括 [参会者]。将议程分解为各个部分,每个部分都有时间估计和目标。

prompt.en: Summarize these meeting notes into a structured recap. The notes are rough and informal. Organize them into categories: key decisions, next steps, and responsibilities. Notes: [paste text].
prompt.zh: 将这些会议记录总结为结构化回顾。记录粗略且非正式。将它们组织成类别:关键决策、下一步和职责。记录:[粘贴文本]。

prompt.en: Turn the following meeting notes into a clean task list. The tasks should be grouped by owner and include deadlines if mentioned. Notes: [paste text].
prompt.zh: 将以下会议记录转换为清晰的任务列表。任务应按负责人分组,如有提及则包含截止日期。记录:[粘贴文本]。

prompt.en: Suggest thoughtful questions to ask in a meeting about [topic]. The purpose of the meeting is [purpose]. Provide a list of at least 5 questions that show preparation and insight.
prompt.zh: 建议在关于 [主题] 的会议中提出的深思熟虑的问题。会议目的是 [目的]。提供至少5个显示准备和洞察力的问题列表。

prompt.en: Write a professional follow-up email after a meeting about [topic]. Include a recap of key points, assigned responsibilities, and next steps with deadlines. Use a clear and polite tone.
prompt.zh: 在关于 [主题] 的会议后撰写专业跟进邮件。包括关键要点回顾、分配的职责以及带截止日期的下一步。使用清晰和礼貌的语气。

prompt.en: Analyze the following workplace issue: [describe issue]. The context is that the problem has occurred multiple times. Identify possible root causes and suggest questions to confirm them.
prompt.zh: 分析以下工作场所问题:[描述问题]。背景是该问题已多次发生。识别可能的根本原因并建议确认问题。

prompt.en: Compare the following two or more possible solutions: [list options]. The decision needs to be made in [timeframe]. Evaluate pros, cons, and potential risks for each option.
prompt.zh: 比较以下两个或多个可能的解决方案:[列出选项]。决策需要在 [时间范围] 内做出。评估每个选项的优点、缺点和潜在风险。

prompt.en: Help define clear decision-making criteria for [describe decision]. The context is that multiple stakeholders are involved. Provide a short list of weighted criteria to guide the choice.
prompt.zh: 帮助为 [描述决策] 定义明确的决策标准。背景是涉及多个利益相关者。提供加权标准的简短列表以指导选择。

prompt.en: Assess the potential risks of the following plan: [describe plan]. The plan is set to start on [date]. List risks by likelihood and impact, and suggest mitigation strategies.
prompt.zh: 评估以下计划的潜在风险:[描述计划]。计划定于 [日期] 开始。按可能性和影响列出风险,并建议缓解策略。

prompt.en: Based on the following background: [describe situation and options], recommend the most suitable option. Explain your reasoning clearly and suggest first steps for implementation.
prompt.zh: 基于以下背景:[描述情况和选项],推荐最合适的选项。清楚地解释您的推理并建议实施的第一步。

description.en: ChatGPT helps structure tasks, time, and priorities.
description.zh: ChatGPT 帮助构建任务、时间和优先级。

prompt.en: Create a prioritized to-do list from the following tasks: [paste tasks]. The context is a typical workday with limited time. Suggest which tasks should be done first and why.
prompt.zh: 从以下任务创建优先级待办事项列表:[粘贴任务]。背景是时间有限的典型工作日。建议应首先完成哪些任务以及原因。

prompt.en: Build a weekly work plan for [describe role or situation]. The week includes deadlines, meetings, and individual focus time. Provide a balanced schedule with recommended priorities.
prompt.zh: 为 [描述角色或情况] 制定每周工作计划。本周包括截止日期、会议和个人专注时间。提供带有推荐优先级的平衡时间表。

prompt.en: Summarize the following document into 5 key points and 3 recommended actions. The document is [type: report, plan, or notes]. Keep the summary concise and professional. Text: [paste document].
prompt.zh: 将以下文档总结为5个关键点和3个推荐操作。文档类型为 [类型:报告、计划或笔记]。保持摘要简洁和专业。文本:[粘贴文档]。

prompt.en: Brainstorm potential solutions to the following workplace challenge: [describe challenge]. Provide at least 5 varied ideas, noting pros and cons for each.
prompt.zh: 为以下工作场所挑战头脑风暴潜在解决方案:[描述挑战]。提供至少5个不同的想法,注明每个的优缺点。

prompt.en: Draft a short project update for stakeholders. The project is [describe project]. Include progress made, current blockers, and next steps. Write in a professional, concise style.
prompt.zh: 为利益相关者起草简短的项目更新。项目是 [描述项目]。包括已取得的进展、当前阻碍和下一步。以专业、简洁的风格撰写。

summary.en: Sales-focused prompts designed to streamline outreach, strategy, competitive intelligence, data analysis, and visual enablement tasks.
summary.zh: 专注于销售的提示词,旨在简化外展、策略、竞争情报、数据分析和视觉辅助任务。

description.en: Focuses on crafting personalized, persuasive communication for prospects and customers. Use canvas for real-time editing, or a custom GPT to create a repeatable process you can share with others in your workspace.
description.zh: 专注于为潜在客户和现有客户制作个性化、有说服力的沟通内容。使用画布进行实时编辑,或创建自定义GPT来建立可与工作区其他人共享的可重复流程。

useCase.en: Draft a personalized cold outreach email

prompt.en: Write a short, compelling cold email to a [job title] at [company name] introducing our product. Use the background below to customize it. Background: [insert value props or ICP info]. Format it in email-ready text.
prompt.zh: Write a short, compelling cold email to a [职位] at [公司名称] introducing our product. Use the background below to customize it. Background: [插入价值主张或ICP信息]. Format it in email-ready text.

prompt.en: Rewrite this follow-up email after a demo to sound more consultative. Original email: [paste here]. Include recap, next steps, and call scheduling CTA. Output as email text.
prompt.zh: Rewrite this follow-up email after a demo to sound more consultative. Original email: [粘贴此处]. Include recap, next steps, and call scheduling CTA. Output as email text.

useCase.en: Draft renewal pitch for key customer
useCase.zh: 起草关键客户续约方案

prompt.en: Draft a renewal pitch for [customer name] based on this renewal history and value data: [paste data]. Include key ROI proof points and renewal recommendation. Output as a short pitch and optional follow-up email.
prompt.zh: Draft a renewal pitch for [客户名称] based on this renewal history and value data: [粘贴数据]. Include key ROI proof points and renewal recommendation. Output as a short pitch and optional follow-up email.

useCase.zh: 创建销售代表活动摘要

prompt.en: Write a daily update summarizing key rep activities. Inputs: [paste call summaries or CRM exports]. Make it upbeat and concise. Output as 3–5 bullet message.
prompt.zh: Write a daily update summarizing key rep activities. Inputs: [paste call summaries or CRM exports]. Make it upbeat and concise. Output as 3–5 bullet message.

prompts.url: https://chatgpt.com/?prompt=Write a daily update summarizing key rep activities. Inputs%3A [paste call summaries or CRM exports]. Make it upbeat and concise. Output as 3–5 bullet message.

useCase.en: Draft exec update on pipeline status
useCase.zh: 起草管道状态高管更新

prompt.en: Summarize our pipeline health this month for execs. Inputs: [paste data]. Include total pipeline, top risks, biggest wins, and forecast confidence. Write it like a short exec update.
prompt.zh: Summarize our pipeline health this month for execs. Inputs: [粘贴数据]. Include total pipeline, top risks, biggest wins, and forecast confidence. Write it like a short exec update.

description.en: Guides account, territory, and pipeline planning for strategic growth. Use a reasoning model for deeper strategic insights.
description.zh: 指导账户、区域和管道规划以实现战略增长。使用推理模型获得更深入的战略洞察。

prompt.en: Create an account plan for [customer name]. Use these inputs: company profile, known priorities, current product usage, stakeholders, and renewal date. Output a structured plan with goals, risks, opportunities, and next steps.
prompt.zh: Create an account plan for [客户名称]. Use these inputs: company profile, known priorities, current product usage, stakeholders, and renewal date. Output a structured plan with goals, risks, opportunities, and next steps.

prompt.en: Create a territory planning guide for our next fiscal year. Inputs: team headcount, target industries, regions, and historical revenue. Recommend allocation method and sample coverage plan.
prompt.zh: Create a territory planning guide for our next fiscal year. Inputs: team headcount, target industries, regions, and historical revenue. Recommend allocation method and sample coverage plan.

useCase.zh: 使用公司数据优先排序客户

prompt.en: I have this list of accounts: [paste sample]. Prioritize them based on [criteria: industry, size, funding, tech stack]. Output a ranked list with reasons why.
prompt.zh: I have this list of accounts: [粘贴样本]. Prioritize them based on [标准:行业、规模、融资、技术栈]. Output a ranked list with reasons why.

useCase.en: Spot high-potential accounts using weighted scoring
useCase.zh: 使用加权评分发现高潜力客户

prompt.en: Score accounts based on [insert rules—e.g., company size, engagement score, intent signals]. Data: [Upload account list]. Output top 10 ranked accounts with their score and a note explaining why.
prompt.zh: Score accounts based on [插入规则—例如公司规模、参与度评分、意向信号]. Data: [上传客户列表]. Output top 10 ranked accounts with their score and a note explaining why.

prompt.en: I’m evaluating market entry into [region/country] for our [SaaS solution]. Research local buying behaviors, competitive landscape, economic conditions, and regulatory concerns. Format as a go/no-go market readiness summary with citations and action steps.
prompt.zh: I’m evaluating market entry into [地区/国家] for our [SaaS解决方案]. Research local buying behaviors, competitive landscape, economic conditions, and regulatory concerns. Format as a go/no-go market readiness summary with citations and action steps.

description.en: Equips sales teams with insights, positioning, and tools to win against competitors. Use deep research or web search for deeper real-time insights.
description.zh: 为销售团队提供洞察、定位和工具,以战胜竞争对手。使用深度研究或网页搜索获得更深入的实时洞察。

prompt.en: Create a battlecard for [competitor name]. Use these notes: [insert positioning data]. Include strengths, weaknesses, how we win, and quick talk track. Output as table format.
prompt.zh: Create a battlecard for [竞争对手名称]. Use these notes: [插入定位数据]. Include strengths, weaknesses, how we win, and quick talk track. Output as table format.

prompt.en: I’m preparing a competitive battlecard for [competitor name]. Research their pricing model, product positioning, recent customer wins/losses, and sales motion. Compare it to ours based on these strengths: [insert]. Output a 1-page summary with citations.
prompt.zh: I’m preparing a competitive battlecard for [竞争对手名称]. Research their pricing model, product positioning, recent customer wins/losses, and sales motion. Compare it to ours based on these strengths: [insert]. Output a 1-page summary with citations.

useCase.zh: 创建销售赋能单页资料

prompt.en: Create a one-pager to help reps pitch [product name] to [persona]. Include key benefits, features, common use cases, and competitor differentiators. Format as copy-ready enablement doc.
prompt.zh: Create a one-pager to help reps pitch [产品名称] to [角色]. Include key benefits, features, common use cases, and competitor differentiators. Format as copy-ready enablement doc.

prompt.en: Create rebuttals to these common objections: [insert 2–3 objections]. Make them sound natural and confident, and include a backup stat or story where useful. Output as list.
prompt.zh: Create rebuttals to these common objections: [插入2-3个异议]. Make them sound natural and confident, and include a backup stat or story where useful. Output as list.

useCase.en: Find customer proof points in the public domain
useCase.zh: 在公共领域查找客户证明点

prompt.en: Research recent online reviews, social mentions, and testimonials about [our product OR competitor product]. Focus on what customers are praising or criticizing. Summarize top 5 quotes, what persona each came from, and where it was posted. Include links.
prompt.zh: Research recent online reviews, social mentions, and testimonials about [我们的产品或竞争对手产品]. Focus on what customers are praising or criticizing. Summarize top 5 quotes, what persona each came from, and where it was posted. Include links.

description.en: ChatGPT analyzes sales data to uncover performance trends and actionable insights.
description.zh: ChatGPT 分析销售数据以发现绩效趋势和可操作的洞察。

useCase.en: Analyze pipeline conversion rates by stage
useCase.zh: 按阶段分析管道转化率

prompt.en: Analyze this sales pipeline export. Calculate conversion rates between each stage and identify the biggest drop-off point. Data: [Upload pipeline CSV]. Output a short summary and a table of conversion % by stage.
prompt.zh: Analyze this sales pipeline export. Calculate conversion rates between each stage and identify the biggest drop-off point. Data: [上传管道CSV]. Output a short summary and a table of conversion % by stage.

useCase.en: Identify top-performing reps by close rate
useCase.zh: 按成交率识别顶级销售代表

prompt.en: From this dataset of rep activities and closed deals, calculate the close rate for each rep and rank them. Data: [Upload rep performance CSV]. Output a ranked list and a sentence for each rep’s strength.
prompt.zh: From this dataset of rep activities and closed deals, calculate the close rate for each rep and rank them. Data: [上传销售代表绩效CSV]. Output a ranked list and a sentence for each rep’s strength.

useCase.zh: 可视化各季度交易速度

prompt.en: Use this CRM export to calculate average deal velocity per quarter (days from lead to close). Data: [Upload with open/close dates]. Show velocity trend in a simple chart and summarize the trendline.
prompt.zh: Use this CRM export to calculate average deal velocity per quarter (days from lead to close). Data: [上传包含开启/关闭日期]. Show velocity trend in a simple chart and summarize the trendline.

useCase.en: Summarize campaign attribution to closed deals
useCase.zh: 总结营销活动对成交的归因

prompt.en: Match campaign sources to closed-won deals from this data. Identify which campaign drove the most closed revenue. Data: [Upload campaign + deal export]. Output a ranked list and a short campaign summary.
prompt.zh: Match campaign sources to closed-won deals from this data. Identify which campaign drove the most closed revenue. Data: [上传营销活动+交易导出]. Output a ranked list and a short campaign summary.

prompt.en: Here’s a table of rep performance by quarter: [paste data]. Compare top vs bottom performers. Show chart with trends and call out key differences. Output as table + insights.
prompt.zh: Here’s a table of rep performance by quarter: [粘贴数据]. Compare top vs bottom performers. Show chart with trends and call out key differences. Output as table + insights.

description.en: ChatGPT creates visual assets and structured collateral for sales enablement.
description.zh: ChatGPT 为销售赋能创建视觉资产和结构化资料。

useCase.en: Visualize sales process in funnel view
useCase.zh: 以漏斗视图可视化销售流程

prompt.en: Create a funnel graphic showing our sales stages: [insert stages]. Make it clean and easy to read for onboarding docs. Output as simple image.
prompt.zh: Create a funnel graphic showing our sales stages: [插入阶段]. Make it clean and easy to read for onboarding docs. Output as simple image.

prompt.en: Create an image of a standard B2B SaaS sales funnel with these stages: Prospecting, Discovery, Demo, Proposal, Closed Won/Lost. Use clean, modern icons and text labels. Output should be clear enough for use in a slide or enablement doc.
prompt.zh: Create an image of a standard B2B SaaS sales funnel with these stages: Prospecting, Discovery, Demo, Proposal, Closed Won/Lost. Use clean, modern icons and text labels. Output should be clear enough for use in a slide or enablement doc.

prompt.en: Create professional illustrations for 3 personas: (1) CFO of a mid-market company, (2) VP of IT at a global enterprise, and (3) Operations Manager at a logistics firm. Style should be flat and modern, ideal for use in a one-pager or training slide.
prompt.zh: Create professional illustrations for 3 personas: (1) CFO of a mid-market company, (2) VP of IT at a global enterprise, and (3) Operations Manager at a logistics firm. Style should be flat and modern, ideal for use in a one-pager or training slide.

prompt.en: Create a simplified U.S. map showing sales territories split by region: West, Central, East. Use distinctive color zones and label key states. Output should look clean and suitable for a sales kickoff deck.
prompt.zh: Create a simplified U.S. map showing sales territories split by region: West, Central, East. Use distinctive color zones and label key states. Output should look clean and suitable for a sales kickoff deck.

prompt.en: Design a fun, modern graphic to celebrate “Top Rep of the Month.” Include a placeholder for name/photo and stylized trophy or badge. Style should match internal brand or newsletter vibe.
prompt.zh: Design a fun, modern graphic to celebrate “Top Rep of the Month.” Include a placeholder for name/photo and stylized trophy or badge. Style should match internal brand or newsletter vibe.

summary.en: Provides customer success use cases covering onboarding strategy, competitive research, account planning, data analytics, and visual communication for customer success teams. It enables fast, structured generation of templates, insights, and diagrams to optimize customer lifecycle management and retention.
summary.zh: 为客户成功团队提供涵盖用户引导策略、竞争研究、客户规划、数据分析和可视化沟通的用例。它能够快速、结构化地生成模板、洞察和图表,以优化客户生命周期管理和留存。

heading.zh: 用户引导与生命周期策略

description.en: ChatGPT can draft customer onboarding and lifecycle retention tactics through templates, feedback synthesis, research, and proactive playbooks.
description.zh: ChatGPT 可以通过模板、反馈综合、研究和主动行动手册来起草客户引导和生命周期留存策略。

useCase.zh: 创建用户引导计划模板

prompt.en: Create a reusable onboarding plan template for [type of customer]. Reference typical timelines, milestones, and stakeholder alignment needs. Format as a week-by-week table with task owners and goals.
prompt.zh: 为 [客户类型] 创建可重复使用的用户引导计划模板。参考典型的时间线、里程碑和利益相关者协调需求。以按周划分的表格格式输出,包含任务负责人和目标。

prompt.en: Summarize onboarding feedback from our last 10 customers in [segment]. Use these shared notes and survey answers. Output a short paragraph per theme: wins, blockers, suggestions.
prompt.zh: 总结我们在 [细分市场] 最近10个客户的用户引导反馈。使用这些共享笔记和调查答案。按主题输出简短段落:成功点、阻碍因素、建议。

useCase.en: Identify best practices for high-touch onboarding
useCase.zh: 识别高接触用户引导最佳实践

prompt.en: Research how leading B2B companies structure high-touch onboarding journeys. Focus on companies with $1M+ ACV and hybrid onboarding models. Include sources and structure the output as a bulleted summary of key tactics with references.
prompt.zh: 研究领先的B2B公司如何构建高接触用户引导流程。重点关注ACV超过100万美元且采用混合引导模式的公司。包含来源,并将输出结构化为带引用的关键策略要点列表。

prompts.url: https://chatgpt.com/?prompt=Research how leading B2B companies structure high-touch onboarding journeys. Focus on companies with %241M%2B ACV and hybrid onboarding models. Include sources and structure the output as a bulleted summary of key tactics with references.

prompt.en: Recommend 3 proactive outreach playbooks for at-risk customers in [industry/segment]. Use trends from recent churn, feature inactivity, and low engagement. Output should include: goal, trigger, CTA, and timing.
prompt.zh: 为 [行业/细分市场] 中有流失风险的客户推荐3个主动外展行动手册。使用近期流失、功能不活跃和低参与度的趋势。输出应包括:目标、触发条件、行动号召和时机。

useCase.zh: 头脑风暴留存激励措施

prompt.en: Suggest creative retention strategies for accounts likely to downgrade in [industry]. Use trends in usage and renewal hesitations we’ve seen. Output 5 tested and 5 novel ideas with pros/cons.
prompt.zh: 为 [行业] 中可能降级的客户建议创意留存策略。使用我们观察到的使用趋势和续约犹豫情况。输出5个经过测试的想法和5个新颖想法,附优缺点。

description.en: ChatGPT conducts external research to benchmark org structures, metrics, tooling, and competitive success program strategies for informed decision-making. Use deep research for even more comprehensive results.
description.zh: ChatGPT 进行外部研究以基准化组织结构、指标、工具和竞争成功项目策略,以支持明智决策。使用深度研究功能可获得更全面的结果。

useCase.zh: 基准化客户成功组织结构

prompt.en: Benchmark the CS org structure for companies like ours in [industry, size]. Focus on roles per customer segment and ratio to revenue. Output as a comparison table with notes on headcount ratios.
prompt.zh: 为 [行业、规模] 中与我们类似的公司基准化客户成功组织结构。重点关注每个客户细分的角色以及与收入的比率。以比较表格形式输出,附人员配比说明。

useCase.zh: 按行业基准化成功指标

prompt.en: Research top 3 success metrics used for customer health scoring in the [industry] sector. Include CSAT, NRR, usage frequency, or other emerging benchmarks. Output as a table comparing metric, source, and benchmark value with citations.
prompt.zh: 研究 [行业] 部门中用于客户健康评分的前3个成功指标。包括CSAT、NRR、使用频率或其他新兴基准。以表格形式输出,比较指标、来源和基准值,附引用。

prompt.en: Research typical Customer Success tech stacks for companies in early-stage, growth-stage, and enterprise. Include categories (e.g., CRM, Success Platform, Analytics). Output a comparison chart with examples and usage notes.
prompt.zh: 研究早期阶段、成长阶段和企业级公司的典型客户成功技术栈。包括类别(例如CRM、成功平台、分析)。输出比较图表,附示例和使用说明。

prompt.en: Research how competitors are supporting enterprise customers post-sale in [industry]. Include examples of success resources, team structure, and onboarding formats. Output as a table comparing 3 competitors with pros/cons per tactic.
prompt.zh: 研究竞争对手如何在 [行业] 中为企业客户提供售后支持。包括成功资源、团队结构和引导格式的示例。以表格形式输出,比较3个竞争对手,每种策略附优缺点。

useCase.en: Create competitive comparison of CS programs
useCase.zh: 创建客户成功项目竞争比较

prompt.en: Research what customer success programs look like at our top 3 competitors. Focus on onboarding, health tracking, and expansion strategies. Output a comparison matrix.
prompt.zh: 研究我们前3个竞争对手的客户成功项目。重点关注引导、健康跟踪和扩展策略。输出比较矩阵。

prompts.url: https://chatgpt.com/?prompt=[Head of CS Strategy.] Research what customer success programs look like at our top 3 competitors. Focus on onboarding%2C health tracking%2C and expansion strategies. Output a comparison matrix with columns%3A

description.en: ChatGPT guides structured preparation for executive communication, QBRs, renewal readiness, and strategic account planning. Use canvas for real-time editing capabilities.
description.zh: ChatGPT 指导为高管沟通、QBR、续约准备和战略客户规划进行结构化准备。使用画布功能进行实时编辑。

prompt.en: Write a weekly update email for [executive stakeholder at customer]. Use these internal notes from this week’s call and usage metrics: [paste here]. Output should be a short, polished email with 3 bullets.
prompt.zh: 为 [客户的高管利益相关者] 撰写每周更新邮件。使用本周电话会议和使用指标的内部笔记:[粘贴此处]。输出应为包含3个要点的简短、精炼的邮件。

prompt.en: Summarize the top wins, risks, and product usage highlights for [Customer Name] ahead of our QBR. Use their latest health score, usage trends, and support ticket history. Format as a bulleted prep doc for internal review.
prompt.zh: 在QBR之前,总结 [客户名称] 的主要成功点、风险和产品使用亮点。使用其最新健康评分、使用趋势和支持工单历史。以要点形式输出,用于内部审查。

prompt.en: Create a renewal call prep checklist for [Customer Name]. Include contract terms, current usage, known risks, and upsell potential. Output as a bulleted checklist.
prompt.zh: 为 [客户名称] 创建续约电话准备清单。包括合同条款、当前使用情况、已知风险和追加销售潜力。以要点清单形式输出。

prompt.en: Draft a 1-pager account plan for [Customer Name]. Use notes from our last 2 calls + contract info + goals: [paste here]. Output should be formatted as goals, blockers, actions, and renewals.
prompt.zh: 为 [客户名称] 起草单页客户计划。使用我们最近2次电话的笔记+合同信息+目标:[粘贴此处]。输出应格式化为:目标、阻碍因素、行动和续约事项。

prompt.en: Draft a renewal risk summary for [Customer Name] ahead of our internal forecast call. Include their renewal date, usage trend, sentiment, and contract notes. Output should be a paragraph summary + 1-line recommendation.
prompt.zh: 在内部预测电话之前,为 [客户名称] 起草续约风险摘要。包括其续约日期、使用趋势、情绪和合同备注。输出应为段落摘要+单行建议。

description.en: Analyzes quantitative and qualitative customer signals to produce metrics definitions, performance insights, risk detection, and scoring frameworks. Create a custom GPT for analysis tasks you complete often.
description.zh: 分析定量和定性客户信号,以生成指标定义、绩效洞察、风险检测和评分框架。为经常完成的分析任务创建自定义GPT。

useCase.zh: 按细分市场概述成功指标

prompt.en: Outline a draft list of success metrics for [segment] customers. Include adoption goals, engagement targets, and renewal benchmarks. Format as a 2-column table: Metric | Definition.
prompt.zh: 为 [细分市场] 客户概述成功指标草案列表。包括采用目标、参与度目标和续约基准。以2列表格格式输出:指标 | 定义。

prompt.en: Review this CSAT survey data from Q2. Calculate overall average, identify outlier scores, and summarize feedback themes if available. Output as a short summary with key stats and top positive/negative feedback examples.
prompt.zh: 审查第二季度的CSAT调查数据。计算总体平均值,识别异常分数,并总结反馈主题(如有)。输出为简短摘要,包含关键统计数据和正面/负面反馈示例。

prompt.en: Examine this export of support tickets from the last quarter. Identify the top 5 recurring issues and provide a short summary of root causes. Output should include a ranked list with issue, frequency, and potential CS actions.
prompt.zh: 检查上季度的支持工单导出数据。识别前5个重复问题并提供根本原因的简短摘要。输出应包括排名列表,附问题、频率和潜在的客户成功行动。

prompt.en: Review this customer usage data from the past 90 days. Identify any customers who may be at risk of churning based on usage drop, login frequency, or support interactions. Summarize the findings in a table with columns: Customer Name | Risk Factor | Notes.
prompt.zh: 审查过去90天的客户使用数据。根据使用下降、登录频率或支持互动,识别可能有流失风险的客户。以表格形式总结结果,列包括:客户名称 | 风险因素 | 备注。

prompt.en: Build a draft health scoring rubric for [segment or region]. Use inputs like usage %, NPS, renewal status, and ticket volume. Output as a table with scoring ranges, weights, and color indicators.
prompt.zh: 为 [细分市场或地区] 构建健康评分标准草案。使用输入如使用百分比、NPS、续约状态和工单量。以表格形式输出,包含评分范围、权重和颜色指示器。

description.en: ChatGPT creates clear, presentation-ready visual diagrams and mockups to communicate journeys, flows, maturity stages, and health indicators.
description.zh: ChatGPT 创建清晰的、可用于演示的可视化图表和模型,以传达客户旅程、流程、成熟度阶段和健康指标。

useCase.zh: 设计客户健康评分模型

prompt.en: Design a visual mock-up of a color-coded health score gauge for customers. Include Low, Medium, High ranges with suggested numerical ranges and icons. Style: dashboard-style, clean lines, professional.
prompt.zh: 设计客户颜色编码健康评分仪表的可视化模型。包括低、中、高范围,附建议的数值范围和图标。风格:仪表板风格、简洁线条、专业。

prompt.en: Turn this outline of customer lifecycle stages into a visual journey map. Use the stages and pain points listed here: [paste text]. Output as a labeled diagram with 5 lifecycle stages.
prompt.zh: 将此客户生命周期阶段大纲转换为可视化旅程图。使用此处列出的阶段和痛点:[粘贴文本]。输出为带标签的图表,包含5个生命周期阶段。

prompt.en: Create a diagram that illustrates the internal escalation process from CSM to Support to Engineering. Include 3 levels of severity and labeled handoff points. Style: flowchart format, minimal colors, ready for internal wiki.
prompt.zh: 创建图表,说明从客户成功经理到支持到工程的内部升级流程。包括3个严重性级别和标记的交接点。风格:流程图格式、最少颜色、可用于内部wiki。

useCase.en: Build a visual customer maturity model
useCase.zh: 构建可视化客户成熟度模型

prompt.en: Create an image that visualizes a 4-stage customer maturity model for a SaaS platform. Each stage should have a title, key behavior pattern, and suggested CS touchpoint. Style: professional, clean, slide-ready.
prompt.zh: 创建图像,可视化SaaS平台的4阶段客户成熟度模型。每个阶段应有标题、关键行为模式和建议的客户成功接触点。风格:专业、简洁、可用于幻灯片。

summary.en: This prompt pack provides high-impact product management prompts covering competitive research, strategy, UX design, content creation, and data analysis. It enables fast, structured insights and deliverables across every stage of the product lifecycle.
summary.zh: 此提示包提供高影响力的产品管理提示词,涵盖竞争研究、策略、用户体验设计、内容创作和数据分析。它能够在产品生命周期的每个阶段快速、结构化地生成洞察和交付成果。

description.en: ChatGPT supports product teams by analyzing competitors, market trends, and regulatory factors to guide product strategy. Use deep research and web search for more real-time insights.
description.zh: ChatGPT 通过分析竞争对手、市场趋势和监管因素来支持产品团队制定产品策略。使用深度研究和网页搜索功能获得更多实时洞察。

useCase.zh: 比较竞争对手的用户引导体验

prompt.en: Research how 3 key competitors structure their onboarding flow for new users. Include screenshots, key steps, and points of friction or delight. Synthesize a comparison table and recommendations for improvement. Target product: [Insert product]
prompt.zh: 研究3个主要竞争对手如何为新用户构建引导流程。包括截图、关键步骤以及摩擦点或亮点。综合比较表并提供改进建议。目标产品:[插入产品]

useCase.zh: 基准化竞争对手定价策略

prompt.en: I’m a product manager launching a new SaaS product. Research how top 5 competitors in this space structure their pricing tiers, freemium vs. paid, feature gating, and upsell triggers. Use public sources and include URLs. Output: A comparison table with insights and risks.
prompt.zh: 我是一名准备推出新SaaS产品的产品经理。研究该领域前5名竞争对手如何构建其定价层级、免费增值与付费、功能限制和追加销售触发点。使用公共来源并包含URL。输出:比较表,附洞察和风险。

prompt.en: Compare the pros and cons of integrating [technology/tool A] vs. [technology/tool B] into our product. Focus on scalability, cost, support, and developer experience. Include citations.
prompt.zh: 比较将 [技术/工具A] 与 [技术/工具B] 集成到我们产品中的优缺点。重点关注可扩展性、成本、支持和开发者体验。包含引用。

useCase.en: Identify regulatory risks for new features
useCase.zh: 识别新功能的监管风险

prompt.en: I’m a PM scoping a [feature] for financial services. Research recent regulatory guidance in the US, UK, and EU around the use of [feature] in customer-facing products. Summarize by region with citations. Output: A table of legal considerations to flag for our legal team and product design implications.
prompt.zh: 我是一名为金融服务规划 [功能] 的产品经理。研究美国、英国和欧盟最近关于在面向客户的产品中使用 [功能] 的监管指南。按地区总结并附引用。输出:法律考虑事项表,供法律团队和产品设计参考。

prompts.url: https://chatgpt.com/?prompt=I’m a PM scoping a new feature for financial services. Research recent regulatory guidance in the US%2C UK%2C and EU around the use of [feature] in customer-facing products. Summarize by region with citations. Output%3A A table of legal considerations and product design implications.

useCase.zh: 研究顶级产品驱动增长策略

prompt.en: Research the top 7 product-led growth strategies used by fast-scaling SaaS companies in the last 2 years. Prioritize those with measurable impact. Include 1–2 examples per tactic and source links. Output: Ranked list with strategy, example, and success metric.
prompt.zh: 研究过去2年快速扩张的SaaS公司使用的前7种产品驱动增长策略。优先考虑有可衡量影响的策略。每种策略包含1-2个示例和来源链接。输出:带策略、示例和成功指标的排名列表。

description.en: ChatGPT guides prioritization, monetization, and vision-setting for product initiatives. Use a reasoning model for more strategic insights.
description.zh: ChatGPT 指导产品计划的优先级排序、货币化和愿景设定。使用推理模型获得更多战略洞察。

useCase.en: Prioritize product roadmap items based on impact
useCase.zh: 根据影响优先排序产品路线图项目

prompt.en: Review this list of upcoming product initiatives. Use the data provided (impact scores, effort estimates, and strategic alignment notes) to suggest priority order. Present the reordered list with justification for each recommendation. [Insert initiative list]
prompt.zh: 审查此即将推出的产品计划列表。使用提供的数据(影响分数、工作量估算和战略一致性说明)建议优先级顺序。提供重新排序的列表,并为每个建议提供理由。[插入计划列表]

prompt.en: We’re considering pricing changes. Based on this product value and audience, suggest 3 monetization strategies. Include pros, cons, and examples of companies using each. [Insert product and audience details]
prompt.zh: 我们正在考虑价格变动。根据此产品价值和受众,建议3种货币化策略。包括优缺点和使用每种策略的公司示例。[插入产品和受众详情]

useCase.en: Draft a vision statement for the product

prompt.en: Based on this long-term goal and user need, write a concise product vision statement. Keep it inspiring and grounded in real outcomes. [Insert product goal]
prompt.zh: 基于此长期目标和用户需求,撰写简洁的产品愿景声明。保持鼓舞人心且基于实际成果。[插入产品目标]

useCase.en: Brainstorm feature ideas from customer feedback
useCase.zh: 从客户反馈中头脑风暴功能想法

prompt.en: Review this batch of customer feedback from the past quarter. Identify pain points and generate a list of 5 feature ideas to address recurring themes. [Insert feedback or summary]
prompt.zh: 审查上季度的客户反馈批次。识别痛点并生成5个功能想法列表来解决重复主题。[插入反馈或摘要]

prompt.en: Review this list of product UI changes and propose 2 A/B test setups. Include hypothesis, success metrics, and potential outcomes. [Insert UI changes or user goals]
prompt.zh: 审查此产品UI变更列表并提出2个A/B测试设置。包括假设、成功指标和潜在结果。[插入UI变更或用户目标]

description.en: ChatGPT creates clear and engaging product documentation, launch materials, and internal content. Use canvas for real-time editing.
description.zh: ChatGPT 创建清晰且引人入胜的产品文档、发布材料和内部内容。使用画布功能进行实时编辑。

useCase.en: Draft PRD for a new feature

prompt.en: Based on this feature idea and customer need, write a first-draft PRD. Include user story, problem statement, solution overview, acceptance criteria, and success metrics. [Insert context or problem]
prompt.zh: 基于此功能想法和客户需求,撰写PRD初稿。包括用户故事、问题陈述、解决方案概述、验收标准和成功指标。[插入背景或问题]

useCase.zh: 起草变更日志和发布说明

prompt.en: Using this release summary, draft user-facing changelog notes for our next version release. Use a friendly, clear tone and group by category (e.g., new, improved, fixed). [Insert release notes or ticket list]
prompt.zh: 使用此发布摘要,为下一个版本发布起草面向用户的变更日志说明。使用友好、清晰的语气,并按类别分组(例如新增、改进、修复)。[插入发布说明或工单列表]

prompt.en: Draft an internal FAQ for our sales and support teams about our upcoming feature launch. Use this background and anticipated questions. Write in a confident, informative tone. [Insert feature and launch details]
prompt.zh: 为我们即将推出的功能发布起草内部FAQ,供销售和支持团队使用。使用此背景和预期问题。以自信、信息丰富的语气撰写。[插入功能和发布详情]

prompt.en: Based on this feature description, write 3 versions of a clear, compelling one-sentence value proposition. Tailor each one to a different target audience. [Insert feature description]
prompt.zh: 基于此功能描述,撰写3个版本的清晰、引人注目的单句价值主张。每个版本针对不同的目标受众。[插入功能描述]

useCase.en: Draft pitch deck for new product

prompt.en: Create a 5-slide outline for a pitch deck introducing our new product to internal stakeholders. Include problem, solution, market, product overview, and timeline. [Insert product idea]
prompt.zh: 创建5页演示文稿大纲,向内部利益相关者介绍我们的新产品。包括问题、解决方案、市场、产品概述和时间表。[插入产品想法]

description.en: ChatGPT generates user journeys, concept visuals, and product design artifacts.
description.zh: ChatGPT 生成用户旅程、概念视觉效果和产品设计作品。

prompt.en: Create a user journey map for our [insert user persona] going through [insert experience]. Include emotional highs/lows, touchpoints, and moments of friction. Output as a visual flow.
prompt.zh: 为我们的 [插入用户角色] 创建经历 [插入体验] 的用户旅程图。包括情绪高低点、接触点和摩擦时刻。以可视化流程输出。

prompt.en: Generate a wireframe-style image of a 3-step onboarding flow for a finance app. Steps include: linking an account, setting financial goals, and reviewing suggestions. Style: greyscale wireframe with labels.
prompt.zh: 生成金融应用程序3步引导流程的线框图样式图像。步骤包括:关联账户、设定财务目标和查看建议。风格:灰度线框图,带标签。

useCase.zh: 说明产品比较视觉效果

prompt.en: Create a side-by-side visual comparison of two app dashboards: one cluttered with too many metrics, and one simplified with actionable insights. Style: dashboard UI, minimalistic, neutral branding.
prompt.zh: 创建两个应用程序仪表板的并排视觉比较:一个杂乱有太多指标,一个简化有可操作的洞察。风格:仪表板UI、极简主义、中性品牌。

prompt.en: Generate a user journey infographic showing the onboarding experience for a mobile health-tracking app. Include key milestones, emotions, and friction points. Style: infographic, vertical layout, soft colors.
prompt.zh: 生成显示移动健康跟踪应用引导体验的用户旅程信息图。包括关键里程碑、情绪和摩擦点。风格:信息图、垂直布局、柔和颜色。

description.en: ChatGPT analyzes feedback, logs, and experiments to uncover trends and inform decisions.
description.zh: ChatGPT 分析反馈、日志和实验以发现趋势并为决策提供信息。

prompt.en: Analyze this set of user feedback and identify the 4 most frequent themes. Summarize each with example quotes and suggested product implications. [Insert feedback or data dump]
prompt.zh: 分析此用户反馈集并识别4个最频繁的主题。用示例引用总结每个主题并建议产品影响。[插入反馈或数据转储]

useCase.zh: 从使用数据中综合洞察

prompt.en: Based on the following product usage data, summarize 3 key behavioral trends and what they suggest about user needs. Recommend 2 follow-up investigations. [Insert data or summary]
prompt.zh: 基于以下产品使用数据,总结3个关键行为趋势以及它们对用户需求的暗示。推荐2个后续调查。[插入数据或摘要]

prompt.en: Review our product rollout plan and highlight 5 risks to successful adoption. Include likelihood, impact, and mitigation recommendations. [Insert rollout plan or summary]
prompt.zh: 审查我们的产品推出计划并突出显示成功采用的5个风险。包括可能性、影响和缓解建议。[插入推出计划或摘要]

prompt.en: Review the results of our recent A/B test (test vs. control). Identify statistical significance, key metrics that changed, and recommend next steps. Present insights clearly with graphs if needed. [Upload test data]
prompt.zh: 审查我们最近的A/B测试结果(测试组与对照组)。识别统计显著性、变化的关键指标并推荐下一步。如需要,清晰地呈现洞察并附图表。[上传测试数据]

useCase.en: Compare feature adoption across customer segments
useCase.zh: 比较跨客户细分的功能采用情况

prompt.en: Use this data to compare how small business vs. enterprise customers adopt our key features. Highlight major differences, usage frequencies, and retention impact. Format output as a table with insights. [Upload CSV or describe dataset]
prompt.zh: 使用此数据比较小型企业与企业客户如何采用我们的关键功能。突出显示主要差异、使用频率和留存影响。以表格形式输出结果并附洞察。[上传CSV或描述数据集]

summary.en: This prompt pack is a curated library of engineering-focused prompts designed to assist with system architecture visualization, technical research, documentation, debugging, and data analysis. It provides ready-to-use queries for generating diagrams, benchmarking tools, reviewing designs, troubleshooting systems, and extracting insights from datasets.
summary.zh: 此提示包是工程专注提示词的精选库,旨在协助系统架构可视化、技术研究、文档编写、调试和数据分析。它提供可立即使用的查询,用于生成图表、基准化工具、审查设计、排除系统故障和从数据集中提取洞察。

description.en: Use ChatGPT to provide comparative analyses of technologies, tools, and industry practices.
description.zh: 使用ChatGPT提供技术、工具和行业实践的比较分析。

prompt.en: I’m an infrastructure engineer evaluating cloud migration options. Context: We’re moving from on-prem to the cloud for a fintech backend. Output: Compare AWS, GCP, and Azure for scalability, pricing, compliance, and developer tooling. Include citations.
prompt.zh: 我是一名评估云迁移选项的基础设施工程师。背景:我们正在将金融科技后端从本地迁移到云端。输出:比较AWS、GCP和Azure的可扩展性、定价、合规性和开发者工具。包含引用。

prompt.en: I’m building a real-time collaboration tool. Context: We need low-latency and scalability. Output: Compare top frameworks (e.g., SignalR, Socket.io, WebRTC) with use cases, pros/cons, and current usage by other SaaS companies. Include sources.
prompt.zh: 我正在构建实时协作工具。背景:我们需要低延迟和可扩展性。输出:比较顶级框架(例如SignalR、Socket.io、WebRTC),包含用例、优缺点以及其他SaaS公司的当前使用情况。包含来源。

prompt.en: Benchmark the top observability tools. Context: We want to move from basic logging to full-stack monitoring. Output: Create a comparison table of features, pricing, integrations for Datadog, New Relic, Prometheus, and OpenTelemetry. Include sources.
prompt.zh: 基准化顶级可观测性工具。背景:我们希望从基本日志记录转向全栈监控。输出:创建Datadog、New Relic、Prometheus和OpenTelemetry的功能、定价、集成比较表。包含来源。

prompt.en: I’m researching AI/ML adoption in logistics systems. Context: Our company is considering integrating predictive routing. Output: A 5-paragraph summary on current trends, vendors, and implementation patterns. Include citations and links.
prompt.zh: 我正在研究物流系统中的AI/ML采用情况。背景:我们公司正在考虑集成预测路由。输出:关于当前趋势、供应商和实施模式的5段摘要。包含引用和链接。

prompt.en: Research best practices for GDPR/CCPA compliance so we can help kick off discussions with our legal team. Context: Our app stores sensitive user data in the EU and US. Output: A compliance checklist with citations, sorted by regulation. Include links to documentation and regulations.
prompt.zh: 研究GDPR/CCPA合规最佳实践,以便我们能够帮助启动与法律团队的讨论。背景:我们的应用在欧盟和美国存储敏感用户数据。输出:带引用的合规检查清单,按法规排序。包含文档和法规链接。

description.en: Use ChatGPT for engineering documentation, design reviews, and planning materials. Use canvas for real-time editing.
description.zh: 使用ChatGPT进行工程文档、设计审查和规划材料。使用画布功能进行实时编辑。

prompt.en: I’ve drafted a technical design document for [insert project or feature]. Review it for clarity, architectural soundness, and completeness. Highlight any missing considerations or questions reviewers may raise.
prompt.zh: 我为 [插入项目或功能] 起草了技术设计文档。审查其清晰度、架构合理性和完整性。突出显示任何遗漏的考虑因素或审查者可能提出的问题。

prompt.en: I need to document how this internal API works for other developers. Here’s the relevant code, schema, and usage examples: [insert materials]. Create clear documentation including endpoints, input/output formats, and expected behavior.
prompt.zh: 我需要为其他开发人员记录此内部API的工作方式。这是相关代码、模式和使用示例:[插入材料]。创建清晰的文档,包括端点、输入/输出格式和预期行为。

useCase.zh: 为值班工程师起草运行手册

prompt.en: I need to create a runbook for on-call engineers supporting [insert system]. Draft one that includes sections for system overview, common alerts, diagnostic steps, and escalation procedures.
prompt.zh: 我需要为支持 [插入系统] 的值班工程师创建运行手册。起草一个包含系统概述、常见警报、诊断步骤和升级程序部分的手册。

useCase.en: Draft onboarding guide for new hires
useCase.zh: 为新员工起草入职指南

prompt.en: I need to write an onboarding guide for new engineers joining [insert team]. Create a draft with sections for required tools, access setup, codebase overview, and first tasks. Make it suitable for self-service onboarding.
prompt.zh: 我需要为加入 [插入团队] 的新工程师编写入职指南。创建包含所需工具、访问设置、代码库概述和首要任务部分的草稿。使其适合自助入职。

prompt.en: Based on this engineering spec for [insert task or feature], write a JIRA ticket that includes the problem statement, context, goals, acceptance criteria, and technical notes for implementation.
prompt.zh: 基于此 [插入任务或功能] 的工程规格,编写包含问题陈述、背景、目标、验收标准和实施技术说明的JIRA工单。

description.en: ChatGPT can help diagnose, troubleshoot, and improve system performance and reliability.
description.zh: ChatGPT可以帮助诊断、排除故障并改进系统性能和可靠性。

prompt.en: A system in production is intermittently failing, and we’re struggling to isolate the root cause. Based on the following logs, metrics, and recent changes: [insert context], help identify the most likely causes and suggest next steps for mitigation.
prompt.zh: 生产中的系统间歇性故障,我们正在努力隔离根本原因。基于以下日志、指标和最近变更:[插入背景],帮助识别最可能的原因并建议缓解措施的下一步。

prompt.en: Our service is experiencing latency and degraded performance during peak usage. Here are metrics, logs, and relevant traces: [insert context]. Help identify the bottlenecks and recommend specific optimizations.
prompt.zh: 我们的服务在高峰使用期间遇到延迟和性能下降。这是指标、日志和相关跟踪:[插入背景]。帮助识别瓶颈并推荐具体优化措施。

prompt.en: A critical data pipeline failed in yesterday’s run. Here are the logs, data volume trends, and error outputs: [insert context]. Analyze what likely went wrong and provide recommendations to prevent recurrence.
prompt.zh: 关键数据管道在昨天的运行中失败了。这是日志、数据量趋势和错误输出:[插入背景]。分析可能出了什么问题并提供防止再次发生的建议。

prompt.en: We currently use [insert tools] for monitoring [insert service]. Review our observability setup and suggest improvements across metrics, logging, alerting, and dashboards to improve issue detection and debugging.
prompt.zh: 我们目前使用 [插入工具] 监控 [插入服务]。审查我们的可观测性设置并建议跨指标、日志记录、警报和仪表板的改进,以改善问题检测和调试。

useCase.zh: 为测试头脑风暴边缘案例

prompt.en: We’re preparing test cases for [insert feature/system]. Brainstorm potential edge cases and failure scenarios that may not be covered by standard testing, including unusual user inputs, system state changes, and concurrency issues.
prompt.zh: 我们正在为 [插入功能/系统] 准备测试用例。头脑风暴标准测试可能未涵盖的潜在边缘案例和失败场景,包括异常用户输入、系统状态变化和并发问题。

description.en: ChatGPT supports with analyzing datasets, identifying trends, and creating visual reports.
description.zh: ChatGPT支持分析数据集、识别趋势和创建可视化报告。

useCase.en: Identify trends in product usage logs
useCase.zh: 识别产品使用日志中的趋势

prompt.en: Analyze this CSV of product usage logs. Context: We want to identify usage trends over time and across user segments. Output: Summary stats + line or bar charts highlighting key trends.
prompt.zh: 分析此产品使用日志CSV。背景:我们希望识别随时间和跨用户细分的使用趋势。输出:摘要统计+突出显示关键趋势的折线图或柱状图。

useCase.en: Visualize system error rates over time
useCase.zh: 可视化随时间的系统错误率

prompt.en: Plot error rates over time from this dataset. Context: It contains application logs from the last month. Output: A time-series chart with callouts for error spikes and a short interpretation.
prompt.zh: 从此数据集绘制随时间的错误率。背景:它包含上个月的应用程序日志。输出:带错误峰值标注和简短解释的时间序列图表。

prompt.en: Analyze this set of performance test results. Context: It compares two versions of our backend service. Output: Side-by-side comparison charts + text summary of improvements or regressions.
prompt.zh: 分析此性能测试结果集。背景:它比较了我们后端服务的两个版本。输出:并排比较图表+改进或回归的文本摘要。

useCase.zh: 根据影响优先排序错误

prompt.en: Analyze this bug report dataset. Context: Each row includes severity, frequency, and affected users. Output: A prioritized list of top bugs with charts showing frequency vs. severity.
prompt.zh: 分析此错误报告数据集。背景:每行包括严重性、频率和受影响用户。输出:显示频率与严重性的图表的顶级错误优先列表。

prompt.en: Summarize this user feedback CSV. Context: It includes ratings and open text responses from a recent survey. Output: Key themes, sentiment scores, and charts showing distribution of ratings.
prompt.zh: 总结此用户反馈CSV。背景:它包括最近调查的评分和开放式文本回复。输出:关键主题、情感分数和显示评分分布的图表。

description.en: ChatGPT can support generating diagrams, flowcharts, and visual representations of complex systems and processes.
description.zh: ChatGPT可以支持生成复杂系统和流程的图表、流程图和可视化表示。

prompt.en: I need to visualize the architecture of [insert system or service]. Generate a component diagram showing key services, data flows, and third-party integrations. Use clear labels and group components logically.
prompt.zh: 我需要可视化 [插入系统或服务] 的架构。生成显示关键服务、数据流和第三方集成的组件图。使用清晰的标签并逻辑分组组件。

prompt.en: Create an image of the system architecture. Context: It’s a microservices-based e-commerce platform with services for payments, catalog, and user profiles. Output: Diagram with labeled services and data flow arrows.
prompt.zh: 创建系统架构图像。背景:这是一个基于微服务的电商平台,具有支付、目录和用户配置文件服务。输出:带标记服务和数据流箭头的图表。

useCase.zh: 向利益相关者解释CI/CD管道

prompt.en: Create an image that explains our CI/CD process. Context: This is for a presentation to business stakeholders. Output: Diagram showing dev → build → test → deploy steps with basic icons and short descriptions.
prompt.zh: 创建解释我们CI/CD流程的图像。背景:这是向业务利益相关者的演示。输出:显示开发→构建→测试→部署步骤的图表,附基本图标和简短描述。

useCase.en: Model data flow in ML pipeline

prompt.en: Create an image showing data flow in a machine learning pipeline. Context: We collect raw user data, clean it, train models, and serve predictions. Output: A labeled flowchart from raw data to inference.
prompt.zh: 创建显示机器学习管道中数据流的图像。背景:我们收集原始用户数据,清洗它,训练模型并提供预测。输出:从原始数据到推理的标记流程图。

useCase.zh: 绘制客户通过应用的旅程图

prompt.en: Create a customer journey map through our mobile banking app. Context: Steps include onboarding, account linking, transactions, and support. Output: A visual flowchart with steps, screens, and decision points.
prompt.zh: 创建客户通过我们移动银行应用的旅程图。背景:步骤包括入职、账户关联、交易和支持。输出:包含步骤、屏幕和决策点的可视化流程图。

summary.en: This prompt pack provides ready-to-use HR and people operations prompts designed to streamline recruiting, engagement, policy development, compliance research, and employee communications. It includes creative design ideas, data-driven analysis tasks, and strategic planning tools to enhance the employee experience and support HR decision-making.
summary.zh: 此提示包提供即用型人力资源和人事运营提示词,旨在简化招聘、参与度、政策制定、合规研究和员工沟通。它包括创意设计想法、数据驱动分析任务和战略规划工具,以增强员工体验并支持人力资源决策。

description.en: ChatGPT helps HR teams explore employee feedback, trends, and reports to inform programs and inform the workplace experience.
description.zh: ChatGPT帮助人力资源团队探索员工反馈、趋势和报告,以为项目和工作场所体验提供信息。

prompt.en: Write 6–8 employee survey questions designed to measure [e.g. belonging, manager trust, workload balance]. Ensure the questions are neutral and easy to understand. Format them as one question per line with rating scale suggestions.
prompt.zh: 撰写6-8个员工调查问题,旨在衡量 [例如归属感、对经理的信任、工作量平衡]。确保问题中立且易于理解。将它们格式化为每行一个问题,附评分量表建议。

prompt.en: Develop a set of five questions for performance reviews that encourage reflection, future goal setting, and actionable feedback. Tailor to [function/team], and keep the tone constructive and growth-oriented. Present the questions as a list for a review form.
prompt.zh: 开发一组五个绩效评估问题,鼓励反思、未来目标设定和可操作的反馈。针对 [职能/团队] 定制,并保持建设性和成长导向的语气。以审查表单的列表形式呈现问题。

prompt.en: Review the following employee exit survey responses and identify the top recurring themes, concerns, and sentiment trends. These responses are from [department/timeframe]. Provide a thematic summary with bullet points and representative quotes. [Insert responses here]
prompt.zh: 审查以下员工离职调查回复并识别最常见的主题、关注点和情感趋势。这些回复来自 [部门/时间范围]。提供主题摘要,附要点和代表性引用。[在此插入回复]

prompt.en: Analyze this employee attrition dataset from the last 12 months. Focus on patterns by department, tenure, and exit reasons. Summarize key insights and suggest 2–3 actions HR should consider. Present findings as bullet points followed by a short paragraph. [Upload your CSV or paste table here]
prompt.zh: 分析过去12个月的员工流失数据集。关注按部门、任期和离职原因的模式。总结关键洞察并建议人力资源应考虑的2-3项行动。以要点形式呈现结果,后跟简短段落。[上传CSV或粘贴表格]

prompt.en: Based on this internal salary data and industry benchmarks, highlight pay discrepancies by role, gender, and level. Include averages, standard deviation, and a visual if possible. Provide a short summary for leadership review. [Upload benchmark and internal files]
prompt.zh: 基于此内部薪资数据和行业基准,按角色、性别和级别突出显示薪酬差异。包括平均值、标准差,如可能还包括可视化。为领导层审查提供简短摘要。[上传基准和内部文件]

description.en: ChatGPT helps analyze HR trends, benchmarks, and industry data to inform policy and planning. Use deep research and web search for real-time insights.
description.zh: ChatGPT帮助分析人力资源趋势、基准和行业数据,以为政策和规划提供信息。使用深度研究和网页搜索功能获得实时洞察。

useCase.zh: 研究全球人力资源合规更新

prompt.en: Research the latest 2024–2025 HR compliance changes in the EU, US, and APAC (focus on remote work laws, employee classification, and data privacy). Provide links to official sources and summarize in plain language. Present findings in a 3-region comparison table with a 1-paragraph summary per region.
prompt.zh: 研究2024-2025年欧盟、美国和亚太地区最新的人力资源合规变化(重点关注远程工作法律、员工分类和数据隐私)。提供官方来源链接并用通俗语言总结。以3地区比较表呈现结果,每个地区附1段摘要。

prompt.en: Research typical DEI program budgets and team sizes for companies with 500–5,000 employees in the US. Include industry benchmarks if available. Present key insights with 3 cited data points and include a simple bullet summary for leadership.
prompt.zh: 研究美国拥有500-5000名员工的公司的典型DEI项目预算和团队规模。如有,包括行业基准。呈现关键洞察,附3个引用数据点,并为领导层提供简单的要点摘要。

useCase.en: Explore top HR tech trends for 2025
useCase.zh: 探索2025年顶级人力资源技术趋势

prompt.en: [You’re briefing HR leadership on tech trends.] Research and summarize the top 5 HR technology trends expected to shape 2025. Include use cases, vendor examples, and implications for mid-sized companies. Synthesize insights into a short executive briefing with citations and actionable recommendations.
prompt.zh: [您正在向人力资源领导层介绍技术趋势。]研究并总结预计将塑造2025年的前5个人力资源技术趋势。包括用例、供应商示例和对中型公司的影响。将洞察综合为简短的高管简报,附引用和可操作建议。

useCase.en: Compare employee retention strategies across industries
useCase.zh: 比较跨行业的员工留存策略

prompt.en: [You are building a retention initiative for a mid-sized tech firm.] Research 3 innovative, high-impact employee retention strategies used in tech, healthcare, and financial services. Focus on post-pandemic engagement challenges. Include cited examples and summarize key elements in a side-by-side comparison chart.
prompt.zh: [您正在为中型科技公司构建留存计划。]研究科技、医疗保健和金融服务中使用的3种创新、高影响力员工留存策略。重点关注疫情后的参与度挑战。包括引用示例并在并排比较图表中总结关键要素。

prompt.en: Research 4 top-rated candidate screening or sourcing tools used by mid-market companies. Summarize features, pricing, compliance status (EEOC), and known limitations. Provide links to primary sources and present findings in a comparison table.
prompt.zh: 研究中端市场公司使用的4种顶级候选人筛选或寻源工具。总结功能、定价、合规状态(EEOC)和已知限制。提供主要来源链接并以比较表呈现结果。

prompts.url: https://chatgpt.com/?prompt=[You’re an HR operations leader evaluating AI recruiting tools.] Research 4 top-rated candidate screening or sourcing tools used by mid-market companies. Summarize features%2C pricing%2C compliance status (EEOC)%2C and known limitations. Provide links to primary sources and present findings in a comparison table.

description.en: ChatGPT guides recruiting processes, engagement planning, and employee communication.
description.zh: ChatGPT协助起草职位描述、筛选标准和候选人沟通。使用画布功能进行实时编辑。

prompt.en: Develop behavioral interview questions aligned to our company values for a [role title] opening in [team/department]. We want to assess both technical skills and culture fit. Provide 6–8 questions grouped by competency.
prompt.zh: 为 [团队/部门] 的 [职位名称] 职位开发与我们公司价值观一致的行为面试问题。我们希望评估技术技能和文化契合度。提供按能力分组的6-8个问题。

prompt.en: Based on this information [insert job responsibilities, skills, team context], write a professional job description for a [job title]. Include a short intro, responsibilities, required qualifications, and what makes the role appealing.
prompt.zh: 基于此信息 [插入工作职责、技能、团队背景],为 [职位名称] 撰写专业职位描述。包括简短介绍、职责、所需资格以及该职位的吸引力所在。

prompt.en: Generate five practical ideas for improving employee engagement across [company/team/region]. Consider our hybrid work model, current engagement scores, and time/resource constraints. Present each idea with a short description, expected impact, and implementation effort level.
prompt.zh: 为 [公司/团队/地区] 生成五个改善员工参与度的实用想法。考虑我们的混合工作模式、当前参与度分数以及时间/资源限制。为每个想法提供简短描述、预期影响和实施难度级别。

prompt.en: Draft a short recognition message to celebrate [employee/team] for their recent accomplishment: [describe what they did]. Write it in a warm, appreciative tone suitable for Slack or email. Keep it under 100 words.
prompt.zh: 起草简短的表彰信息,庆祝 [员工/团队] 最近的成就:[描述他们做了什么]。以温暖、感激的语气撰写,适合Slack或电子邮件。保持在100字以内。

prompt.en: Design a one-hour DEI workshop for employees at [company/team]. The goal is to foster inclusive communication and awareness. Include an agenda, key learning objectives, interactive activities, and 2–3 discussion questions.
prompt.zh: 为 [公司/团队] 的员工设计一小时的DEI工作坊。目标是促进包容性沟通和意识。包括议程、关键学习目标、互动活动和2-3个讨论问题。

description.en: ChatGPT helps develop clear internal communications, onboarding plans, and wellbeing programs.
description.zh: ChatGPT帮助制定清晰的内部沟通、入职计划和福祉项目。

prompt.en: Summarize the key points of this [internal policy or handbook section] so HR business partners can understand and communicate it effectively. This policy relates to [brief description or context]. Present the summary in clear, professional language under 200 words.
prompt.zh: 总结此 [内部政策或手册部分] 的要点,以便人力资源业务合作伙伴能够理解并有效沟通。此政策涉及 [简要描述或背景]。以200字以内的清晰、专业语言呈现摘要。

prompt.en: Write an employee-facing FAQ to support our return-to-office transition. Use this background information [insert key RTO plan details]. Cover top employee concerns (e.g. hybrid schedules, health protocols, expectations) in a warm and clear tone. Include 5–7 questions with answers.
prompt.zh: 撰写面向员工的FAQ以支持我们的返回办公室过渡。使用此背景信息 [插入关键RTO计划详情]。以温暖和清晰的语气涵盖员工最关心的问题(例如混合时间表、健康协议、期望)。包括5-7个问题和答案。

prompt.en: Build a 5-day onboarding schedule for new hires in [department or region]. Include orientation goals, topics to cover, people to meet, and relevant tools or resources. Present it in a simple day-by-day table with time blocks if helpful.
prompt.zh: 为 [部门或地区] 的新员工构建5天入职时间表。包括入职目标、要涵盖的主题、要见面的人员以及相关工具或资源。以简单的按天划分的表格呈现,如有帮助可包含时间段。

prompt.en: Suggest three tailored wellbeing programs for employees at [company/team], considering recent feedback and budget constraints. Include rationale, estimated costs, and potential success metrics. Present ideas as a short proposal summary.
prompt.zh: 为 [公司/团队] 的员工建议三个量身定制的福祉项目,考虑最近的反馈和预算限制。包括理由、估计成本和潜在成功指标。以简短提案摘要形式呈现想法。

prompt.en: Create a phased plan to roll out a new compliance training across [team/region]. Include timing, communications strategy, target audiences, and support materials. Present the plan in bullet points or as a 4-week calendar.
prompt.zh: 创建分阶段计划,在 [团队/地区] 推出新的合规培训。包括时间安排、沟通策略、目标受众和支持材料。以要点或4周日历形式呈现计划。

description.en: ChatGPT creates HR visuals, banners, and internal branding assets for a polished employee experience.
description.zh: ChatGPT创建人力资源视觉效果、横幅和内部品牌资产,以提供精美的员工体验。

useCase.en: Create a welcome banner for onboarding

prompt.en: Create an image for a new employee onboarding welcome banner. Style: clean and modern. Mood: warm and inclusive. Format: horizontal banner with space for overlay text. Include visual cues like a diverse team, coffee cups, or digital collaboration tools.
prompt.zh: 为新员工入职欢迎横幅创建图像。风格:简洁现代。氛围:温暖包容。格式:带覆盖文本空间的水平横幅。包括多元化团队、咖啡杯或数字协作工具等视觉提示。

prompt.en: Create a poster-style image for an internal DEI campaign. Style: bold, minimal. Include abstract representations of diversity (hands, overlapping shapes, color blocks). Mood: optimistic and forward-looking. Include placeholder space for a slogan or quote.
prompt.zh: 为内部DEI活动创建海报风格图像。风格:大胆、极简。包括多样性的抽象表现(手、重叠形状、色块)。氛围:乐观和前瞻性。包括标语或引用的占位空间。

prompt.en: Generate an illustration showing a hybrid work scenario: a person working from home, a coworking space, and a modern office. Style: flat illustration or soft 3D. Intended for use in HR documentation.
prompt.zh: 生成显示混合工作场景的插图:一个人在家工作、共享办公空间和现代办公室。风格:扁平插画或柔和3D。用于人力资源文档。

prompt.en: Create a simple visual diagram of the employee lifecycle: attract, onboard, develop, retain, offboard. Use icons or abstract figures to represent each phase. Style: corporate presentation-ready.
prompt.zh: 创建员工生命周期的简单可视化图表:吸引、入职、发展、留存、离职。使用图标或抽象图形表示每个阶段。风格:企业演示就绪。

summary.en: Prompts for IT teams that highlight use cases from generating scripts and troubleshooting code to drafting documentation and responding to support tickets.
summary.zh: 此提示包为IT和技术运营团队提供即用型提示词,涵盖系统管理、安全、技术支持、基础设施规划和文档编写。它简化了故障排除、合规研究、自动化和技术沟通任务。

description.en: ChatGPT can help compare cloud services, IT vendors, and emerging technology solutions to guide strategic decision-making. Use deep research and web search for deeper real-time insights.
description.zh: ChatGPT帮助比较云服务、IT供应商和新兴技术解决方案,以指导战略决策。使用深度研究和网页搜索获得更深入的实时洞察。

prompt.en: Compare AWS, Azure, and GCP for our use case: [insert workload or environment]. Consider cost, uptime, global availability, and ease of integration. Research using 2025 data, and present a table comparing each provider with a recommendation at the end.
prompt.zh: 为我们的用例比较AWS、Azure和GCP:[插入工作负载或环境]。考虑成本、正常运行时间、全球可用性和集成便利性。使用2025年数据进行研究,以表格形式呈现每个提供商的比较,并在最后提供推荐。

prompt.en: Research and compare remote access vendors for enterprise use. Focus on features, pricing, integrations, and support quality. Use 2025 data, and summarize the findings in a comparison table with notes.
prompt.zh: 研究并比较企业级远程访问供应商。重点关注功能、定价、集成和支持质量。使用2025年数据,在带有注释的对比表中总结研究结果。

prompt.en: I'm an IT Manager at [insert company]. I'm evaluating observability platforms. Research current offerings, pricing, supported environments, and key differentiators in 2025. Include citations and summarize insights in a comparison table with a recommendation for a mid-size engineering org.
prompt.zh: 我是[插入公司]的IT经理。我正在评估可观测性平台。研究当前产品、定价、支持的环境以及2025年的关键差异化因素。包含引用并在对比表中总结洞察,为中型工程组织提供推荐。

prompt.en: I'm a Security Architect working on adopting a zero trust model. Research leading frameworks (e.g., NIST 800-207) and recent updates to best practices in 2024–2025. Include real-world implementation case studies where possible. Provide a summarized comparison and an executive-ready briefing.
prompt.zh: 我是一名致力于采用零信任模型的安全架构师。研究领先的框架(例如NIST 800-207)以及2024-2025年最佳实践的最新更新。尽可能包含真实世界的实施案例研究。提供总结性比较和高管就绪简报。

description.en: ChatGPT guides research and documentation on compliance requirements, access reviews, and security posture evaluations.
description.zh: ChatGPT支持安全审计、漏洞评估和合规性研究。使用网页搜索获得最新威胁情报。

useCase.zh: 评估全球数据驻留法规

prompt.en: I'm an IT Compliance Lead planning a global data storage architecture. Research 2025 data residency requirements across the EU, US, APAC, and LATAM. Include regulatory restrictions and preferred cloud regions. Cite official documentation and summarize findings in a table grouped by region.
prompt.zh: 我是IT合规主管,正在规划全球数据存储架构。研究2025年欧盟、美国、亚太和拉美地区的数据驻留要求。包括监管限制和首选云区域。引用官方文档并在按地区分组的表格中总结研究结果。

prompt.en: As an IT Service Delivery Lead, I need a secure, scalable remote access tool for our hybrid team. Compare current vendors (e.g., BeyondTrust, TeamViewer Tensor, Chrome Remote Desktop) for enterprise use in 2025. Focus on SSO support, encryption, session logging, and pricing. Provide a security-focused executive summary with links to primary sources.
prompt.zh: 作为IT服务交付主管,我需要为混合团队提供安全、可扩展的远程访问工具。比较当前供应商(例如BeyondTrust、TeamViewer Tensor、Chrome Remote Desktop)在2025年的企业级应用。关注SSO支持、加密、会话日志和定价。提供以安全为重点的高管摘要,并附上主要来源链接。

prompt.en: Based on SOC 2 guidelines, create a checklist of IT-specific controls to review for an upcoming internal audit. Use this existing audit prep document as background. Organize the checklist by domain (e.g., access, change management, incident response).
prompt.zh: 基于SOC 2指南,创建即将进行的内部审计需要审查的IT特定控制检查清单。使用现有审计准备文档作为背景。按领域(例如访问控制、变更管理、事件响应)组织检查清单。

prompt.en: Review this access matrix of users, roles, and systems. Check whether each user's access level follows our least-privilege policy. Identify any potential overprovisioning, and provide a table listing users with permissions that may need to be scaled back.
prompt.zh: 审查此用户、角色和系统的访问矩阵。检查每个用户的访问级别是否遵循最小权限原则。识别任何潜在的过度配置,并提供一个表格,列出可能需要缩减权限的用户。

prompt.en: Review this API schema and a sample set of traffic logs. Identify common API security issues such as poor input validation or lack of authentication. Provide a bullet-point list of findings with suggested fixes.
prompt.zh: 审查此API架构和一组流量日志样本。识别常见的API安全问题,如输入验证不足或缺乏身份验证。提供研究结果的要点列表及建议的修复方法。

description.en: ChatGPT supports operational planning, asset lifecycle policies, onboarding processes, and IT ticket prioritization.
description.zh: ChatGPT支持运营规划、资产生命周期政策、入职流程和IT工单优先级排序。

prompt.en: Create a checklist for onboarding new hires from an IT perspective. Include key steps for account provisioning, security training, and hardware setup. Use this outline of our current process, and present the checklist organized by day or week.
prompt.zh: 从IT角度为新员工入职创建检查清单。包括账户配置、安全培训和硬件设置的关键步骤。使用我们当前流程的大纲,按天或周组织检查清单。

useCase.zh: 生成硬件生命周期政策

prompt.en: Create a draft policy for managing the lifecycle of company laptops and desktops. Reference this spreadsheet of device ages and current replacement costs. Write a formal document with guidance on replacement timelines, support windows, and environmental considerations.
prompt.zh: 为管理公司笔记本电脑和台式机的生命周期创建政策草案。参考设备使用年限和当前更换成本的电子表格。撰写正式文档,提供更换时间表、支持窗口和环境考虑的指导。

prompt.en: Write a formal policy for maintaining and auditing IT asset inventory. Use this list of tools, departments, and stakeholders as a starting point. Include purpose, responsibilities, and process for inventory reconciliation.
prompt.zh: 为维护和审计IT资产库存编写正式政策。使用此工具、部门和利益相关者列表作为起点。包括目的、职责和库存核对流程。

prompt.en: Review this queue of open IT support tickets. Use this prioritization rubric based on impact, urgency, and SLA. Reorder the tickets accordingly and present the list as a prioritized backlog with a short reason for each ranking.
prompt.zh: 审查此待处理IT支持工单队列。使用基于影响、紧急程度和SLA的优先级标准。相应地重新排序工单,并将列表作为优先级待办事项呈现,每个排名都附上简短原因。

useCase.zh: 跟踪硬件生命周期风险

prompt.en: Use this device inventory file containing purchase dates, models, and OS versions. Highlight which assets are past end-of-life or nearing refresh thresholds. Create a table of at-risk devices and include a narrative summary for IT leadership.
prompt.zh: 使用包含购买日期、型号和操作系统版本的设备库存文件。突出显示哪些资产已过生命周期终止日期或接近更新阈值。创建高风险设备表,并为IT领导层提供叙述性摘要。

description.en: ChatGPT assists with drafting communications, postmortems, and disaster recovery plans for IT services.
description.zh: ChatGPT协助起草IT服务的沟通文档、事后分析和灾难恢复计划。

prompt.en: Summarize the recent [insert system or service] outage. Include the root cause, timeline of events, user impact, and actions taken. Use information from the incident ticket or war room notes, and format the summary as a shareable internal postmortem report.
prompt.zh: 总结最近的[插入系统或服务]故障。包括根本原因、事件时间线、用户影响和已采取的措施。使用事件工单或作战室笔记中的信息,将摘要格式化为可共享的内部事后分析报告。

useCase.zh: 创建灾难恢复手册草案

prompt.en: Create a draft disaster recovery playbook for a critical production service. Use this system diagram and our recovery objectives (RTO, RPO). Organize the playbook into steps to take before, during, and after a service outage.
prompt.zh: 为关键生产服务创建灾难恢复手册草案。使用此系统图和我们的恢复目标(RTO、RPO)。将手册组织为服务中断前、期间和之后要采取的步骤。

prompt.en: Write a professional internal communication announcing planned downtime for [insert system or tool]. Include timing, affected users, impact on work, and who to contact for questions. Write the message in the tone of an IT team update.
prompt.zh: 撰写专业的内部沟通,宣布[插入系统或工具]的计划停机。包括时间、受影响的用户、对工作的影响以及问题联系人。以IT团队更新的语气撰写消息。

useCase.en: Translate error logs to plain language
useCase.zh: 将错误日志翻译为通俗语言

prompt.en: Help translate these system error logs into language that can be understood by a non-technical executive. Use definitions where needed, and summarize what each log entry means in a few clear sentences. Present the explanation as an email draft.
prompt.zh: 帮助将这些系统错误日志翻译为非技术高管能理解的语言。在需要时使用定义,用几句清晰的话总结每个日志条目的含义。以电子邮件草稿形式呈现解释。

prompt.en: Review our current list of SaaS tools used by IT, engineering, and ops. Use the attached spreadsheet with cost, team usage, and tool functions. Identify overlapping tools and recommend 3–5 candidates for consolidation, explaining why each was chosen in a short summary report.
prompt.zh: 审查IT、工程和运营使用的当前SaaS工具列表。使用包含成本、团队使用情况和工具功能的附加电子表格。识别重叠的工具并推荐3-5个合并候选项,在简短的摘要报告中解释选择每个的原因。

description.en: CharGPT analyzes logs, uptime, and system performance to propose improvements and forecast trends.
description.zh: ChatGPT分析日志、正常运行时间和系统性能,以提出改进建议和预测趋势。

prompt.en: Analyze the system health logs from the last 30 days. Focus on spikes in CPU/memory, service outages, and recurring error codes. Provide a concise summary of the key issues and add brief commentary on possible causes or needed follow-ups.
prompt.zh: 分析过去30天的系统健康日志。关注CPU/内存峰值、服务中断和重复出现的错误代码。提供关键问题的简明摘要,并就可能的原因或需要的后续行动添加简要评论。

prompt.en: Review our monitoring setup for [insert system] based on the current configuration and recent alert history. Identify 2–3 areas for improvement, such as gaps in alert coverage, noise reduction, or metrics tuning. Present the suggestions in a short internal memo.
prompt.zh: 根据当前配置和最近的警报历史审查[插入系统]的监控设置。识别2-3个改进领域,例如警报覆盖范围的差距、噪音减少或指标调优。在简短的内部备忘录中呈现建议。

useCase.en: Analyze service uptime and incident frequency
useCase.zh: 分析服务正常运行时间和事件频率

prompt.en: Review this CSV with daily uptime % and incident logs for [insert service] over the past quarter. Identify patterns in outages, frequency of issues by severity, and calculate overall uptime. Summarize findings and suggest actions for improvement in a brief report.
prompt.zh: 审查包含过去一个季度[插入服务]的每日正常运行时间百分比和事件日志的CSV文件。识别中断模式、按严重程度分类的问题频率,并计算总体正常运行时间。在简短报告中总结发现并建议改进措施。

useCase.en: Audit user access logs for anomalies
useCase.zh: 审计用户访问日志异常

prompt.en: Analyze this user access log export. Identify users or IP addresses with unusual access frequency, after-hours logins, or failed attempts. Flag suspicious patterns and summarize results in a security review format.
prompt.zh: 分析此用户访问日志导出。识别访问频率异常、非工作时间登录或失败尝试的用户或IP地址。标记可疑模式并以安全审查格式总结结果。

prompt.en: Analyze this export of support ticket volume by week for the past 12 months. Identify seasonality trends and forecast volume for the next quarter. Visualize the trend and provide commentary for capacity planning.
prompt.zh: 分析过去12个月按周统计的支持工单量导出数据。识别季节性趋势并预测下一季度的工单量。可视化趋势并为容量规划提供评论。

prompt.en: Analyze this security incident and provide a detailed report: [describe incident]. Include timeline, affected systems, root cause analysis, immediate actions taken, and recommendations for preventing similar incidents.
prompt.zh: 分析以下安全事件并提供详细报告:[描述事件]。包括时间线、受影响的系统、根本原因分析、已采取的即时措施以及防止类似事件的建议。

prompt.en: Create a post-mortem report for the following system outage: [describe outage]. Include incident timeline, impact assessment, root cause, resolution steps, and action items to prevent recurrence.
prompt.zh: 为以下系统故障创建事后分析报告:[描述故障]。包括事件时间线、影响评估、根本原因、解决步骤以及防止再次发生的行动项。

prompt.en: Help me plan an infrastructure upgrade for [system/component]. Consider current capacity, expected growth, budget constraints, downtime requirements, and risk mitigation. Provide a phased implementation plan.
prompt.zh: 帮助我规划[系统/组件]的基础设施升级。考虑当前容量、预期增长、预算约束、停机要求和风险缓解。提供分阶段实施计划。

prompt.en: Create a comprehensive deployment checklist for [application/system]. Include pre-deployment verification, deployment steps, rollback procedures, post-deployment validation, and communication plan.
prompt.zh: 为[应用程序/系统]创建全面的部署检查清单。包括部署前验证、部署步骤、回滚程序、部署后验证和沟通计划。

prompt.en: Draft an IT policy for [topic] (e.g., remote access, BYOD, data retention). Include policy statement, scope, responsibilities, procedures, compliance requirements, and enforcement guidelines.
prompt.zh: 为[主题](例如:远程访问、自带设备、数据保留)起草IT政策。包括政策声明、范围、职责、程序、合规要求和执行指南。

prompt.en: Explain [technical concept] to a non-technical stakeholder. Use analogies, avoid jargon, and focus on business impact and practical implications. Make it clear and concise.
prompt.zh: 向非技术利益相关者解释[技术概念]。使用类比,避免术语,关注业务影响和实际意义。使其清晰简洁。

prompt.en: Help me troubleshoot this issue: [describe problem]. Provide a systematic approach including: initial diagnostics, common causes, step-by-step troubleshooting process, and potential solutions.
prompt.zh: 帮助我排查此问题:[描述问题]。提供系统化的方法,包括:初步诊断、常见原因、逐步排查过程和潜在解决方案。

prompt.en: Design a backup and disaster recovery strategy for [system/data]. Consider RPO, RTO, backup frequency, storage requirements, testing procedures, and cost optimization.
prompt.zh: 为[系统/数据]设计备份和灾难恢复策略。考虑恢复点目标、恢复时间目标、备份频率、存储要求、测试程序和成本优化。

prompt.en: Review this vendor proposal: [paste proposal or describe]. Evaluate technical capabilities, security compliance, scalability, support services, pricing structure, and identify potential risks or concerns.
prompt.zh: 审查此供应商提案:[粘贴提案或描述]。评估技术能力、安全合规性、可扩展性、支持服务、定价结构,并识别潜在风险或关注点。

prompt.en: Create API documentation for [API name]. Include overview, authentication, endpoints, request/response formats, error codes, rate limits, and usage examples. Format for developer clarity.
prompt.zh: 为[API名称]创建API文档。包括概述、身份验证、端点、请求/响应格式、错误代码、速率限制和使用示例。以便于开发人员理解的格式输出。

prompt.en: Create a security audit plan for [system/network]. Include scope definition, audit objectives, testing methodology, compliance frameworks, timeline, and deliverables.
prompt.zh: 为[系统/网络]创建安全审计计划。包括范围定义、审计目标、测试方法、合规框架、时间表和可交付成果。

prompt.en: Draft a change request for [proposed change]. Include business justification, technical description, impact analysis, implementation plan, rollback strategy, and required approvals.
prompt.zh: 为[提议的变更]起草变更请求。包括业务理由、技术描述、影响分析、实施计划、回滚策略和所需审批。

prompt.en: Analyze these server logs and identify issues: [paste logs or describe patterns]. Look for errors, performance bottlenecks, security concerns, and unusual patterns. Provide actionable recommendations.
prompt.zh: 分析以下服务器日志并识别问题:[粘贴日志或描述模式]。查找错误、性能瓶颈、安全问题和异常模式。提供可操作的建议。

prompt.en: Design a monitoring strategy for [system/application]. Define key metrics, alert thresholds, escalation procedures, dashboard requirements, and integration with existing tools.
prompt.zh: 为[系统/应用程序]设计监控策略。定义关键指标、警报阈值、升级程序、仪表板要求以及与现有工具的集成。

prompt.en: Suggest database optimization strategies for [database system] experiencing [performance issue]. Consider indexing, query optimization, caching, partitioning, and configuration tuning.
prompt.zh: 为遇到[性能问题]的[数据库系统]建议数据库优化策略。考虑索引、查询优化、缓存、分区和配置调优。

prompt.en: Create a runbook for [process/system]. Include step-by-step procedures, prerequisites, expected outcomes, troubleshooting tips, escalation contacts, and relevant documentation links.
prompt.zh: 为[流程/系统]创建运维手册。包括逐步程序、前提条件、预期结果、故障排除提示、升级联系人和相关文档链接。

prompt.en: Evaluate this technology stack for [project/application]: [list technologies]. Consider scalability, maintainability, team expertise, community support, licensing, and long-term viability.
prompt.zh: 评估[项目/应用程序]的此技术栈:[列出技术]。考虑可扩展性、可维护性、团队专业知识、社区支持、许可和长期可行性。

prompt.en: Create a data migration plan from [source] to [target]. Include data mapping, transformation rules, validation procedures, rollback plan, downtime estimation, and testing strategy.
prompt.zh: 创建从[源]到[目标]的数据迁移计划。包括数据映射、转换规则、验证程序、回滚计划、停机时间估算和测试策略。

prompt.en: Develop an incident response plan for [incident type]. Include detection procedures, containment steps, eradication process, recovery procedures, and post-incident review guidelines.
prompt.zh: 为[事件类型]制定事件响应计划。包括检测程序、遏制步骤、根除过程、恢复程序和事后审查指南。

prompt.en: Help me calculate the Total Cost of Ownership for [system/solution]. Consider hardware, software licensing, implementation, maintenance, training, support, and opportunity costs over [timeframe].
prompt.zh: 帮助我计算[系统/解决方案]的总拥有成本。考虑硬件、软件许可、实施、维护、培训、支持以及[时间范围]内的机会成本。

summary.en: A curated set of manager-focused prompts designed to streamline team leadership tasks, from setting strategic goals and analyzing team health to fostering culture and effective communication. It combines visual storytelling, research-backed insights, and actionable frameworks to help leaders improve engagement, performance, and alignment.
summary.zh: 此提示包为各级经理提供实用提示词,涵盖团队管理、绩效辅导、战略规划、沟通和运营效率。它支持1对1会议准备、目标设定、反馈传递和团队发展。

description.en: ChatGPT helps shape forward-looking goals, resource allocation, and narrative alignment to organizational strategy.
description.zh: ChatGPT帮助制定前瞻性目标、资源分配和与组织战略的叙事对齐。

prompt.en: Draft clear and measurable quarterly goals for my team. Here is the business context, company objectives, and recent performance: [insert context]. Return 3 Objectives with 3-4 Key Results each, in a simple bullet format.
prompt.zh: 为我的团队起草清晰且可衡量的季度目标。这是业务背景、公司目标和最近的绩效:[插入背景]。返回3个目标,每个目标包含3-4个关键结果,以简单的项目符号格式呈现。

prompt.en: I need to brief my VP on team progress. Based on this weekly summary: [insert notes], generate concise talking points grouped into achievements, blockers, and asks.
prompt.zh: 我需要向副总裁汇报团队进展。基于此周度总结:[插入笔记],生成简洁的谈话要点,分组为成就、阻碍和需求。

prompt.en: I'm trying to assess skill gaps on my team. Here's our current skill matrix and desired future state: [insert info]. Identify key gaps and suggest training or hiring solutions. Return findings in a short table.
prompt.zh: 我正在尝试评估团队的技能差距。这是我们当前的技能矩阵和期望的未来状态:[插入信息]。识别关键差距并建议培训或招聘解决方案。以简短表格形式返回发现。

prompt.en: I need to plan hiring needs for the next two quarters. Here's our current team structure and projected growth: [insert info]. Suggest a phased hiring plan with rationale for each role and proposed timing.
prompt.zh: 我需要规划未来两个季度的招聘需求。这是我们当前的团队结构和预期增长:[插入信息]。建议分阶段招聘计划,包括每个角色的理由和拟议时间。

prompt.en: We just experienced a strategic pivot. Here's what changed: [insert details]. Help me reframe our team's goals and narrative to align with the new direction. Provide 2-3 talking points and a revised team goal statement.
prompt.zh: 我们刚刚经历了战略转型。这是变化的内容:[插入详情]。帮助我重构团队的目标和叙事,以与新方向保持一致。提供2-3个谈话要点和修订的团队目标声明。

description.en: ChatGPT supports managers in guiding feedback, development conversations, and conflict resolution.
description.zh: ChatGPT支持提供建设性反馈、指导职业发展和管理绩效评估。使用画布功能进行实时编辑。

prompt.en: Draft a 1:1 meeting template for my direct reports. I want it to include check-ins on progress, roadblocks, career growth, and feedback. Format it as a bulleted agenda with guiding questions.
prompt.zh: 为我的直接下属起草1对1会议模板。我希望包括进度签到、障碍、职业发展和反馈。以带有指导性问题的项目符号议程格式呈现。

prompt.en: I want to give constructive feedback to a report who is underperforming. The issue is [insert behavior]. Suggest 2-3 ways to phrase it constructively, with pros and cons of each approach.
prompt.zh: 我想向表现不佳的下属提供建设性反馈。问题是[插入行为]。建议2-3种建设性的表达方式,并说明每种方法的优缺点。

prompt.en: I have a difficult conversation coming up with a team member about [insert issue]. Help me think through what to say, how to open, and what questions to ask. Return a 3-part conversation guide.
prompt.zh: 我即将与团队成员就[插入问题]进行一次困难的对话。帮助我思考该说什么、如何开场以及提出什么问题。返回3部分的对话指南。

prompt.en: I'm dealing with a conflict between my team and another function. Here's a summary of the tension and recent incidents: [insert info]. Suggest root causes and a 3-step mediation approach I can try.
prompt.zh: 我正在处理我的团队与另一个部门之间的冲突。这是紧张局势和最近事件的摘要:[插入信息]。建议根本原因和我可以尝试的3步调解方法。

description.en: ChatGPT analyzes quantitative and qualitative data to surface workload balance, capability gaps, performance trends, and overall team health.
description.zh: ChatGPT分析定量和定性数据,以揭示工作负载平衡、能力差距、绩效趋势和整体团队健康状况。

prompt.en: Based on this timesheet data (weekly hours logged per person), flag any early signs of burnout risk. Use a threshold of >45 hours for 2+ weeks. Return a summary of flagged employees and trends in average hours.
prompt.zh: 基于此考勤数据(每人每周记录的工时),标记任何倦怠风险的早期迹象。使用超过45小时持续2周以上的阈值。返回标记员工的摘要和平均工时趋势。

prompt.en: I have a CSV that shows task assignments and completion times per team member for the last 4 weeks. Analyze workload distribution across the team—identify who may be overburdened or underutilized, and summarize in a short paragraph with a chart.
prompt.zh: 我有一个CSV文件,显示了过去4周每个团队成员的任务分配和完成时间。分析团队的工作负载分布——识别谁可能负担过重或利用不足,并在简短段落中总结并附上图表。

prompt.en: I'm noticing signs of disengagement or dysfunction on my team. Based on this description of recent behavior and team dynamics: [insert description], what are the likely causes and what should I do next? Provide a 3-part action plan.
prompt.zh: 我注意到团队出现脱离或功能失调的迹象。基于最近行为和团队动态的描述:[插入描述],可能的原因是什么,我接下来应该做什么?提供3部分行动计划。

description.en: ChatGPT conducts external research to surface benchmarks, evidence-based practices, and comparative insights to help strengthen programs and enhance engagement initiatives. Use deep research and web search for more real-time insights.
description.zh: ChatGPT进行外部研究,以展示基准、循证实践和比较洞察,帮助加强项目和提升参与度。使用深度研究和网页搜索获得更实时的洞察。

useCase.zh: 混合工作模式最佳实践

prompt.en: I lead a hybrid team in [insert industry]. Research effective engagement and collaboration practices from the last 2 years. Focus on techniques proven to improve team trust, reduce burnout, and sustain productivity. Provide a top 5 list with supporting evidence and links.
prompt.zh: 我在[插入行业]领导一个混合工作团队。研究过去2年的有效参与和协作实践。关注已被证明能提高团队信任、减少倦怠和维持生产力的技术。提供前5名列表,附带支持证据和链接。

prompt.en: I'm a [insert role, e.g. Senior Engineering Manager] at a [insert company type, e.g., 500-person SaaS company]. I want to benchmark manager-to-IC ratios across similar tech firms. Focus on industry norms, variations by team type (engineering, product, etc.), and recommendations for scaling. Provide citations and a comparison table.
prompt.zh: 我是[插入公司类型,例如500人的SaaS公司]的[插入角色,例如高级工程经理]。我想在类似的科技公司中基准管理者与个人贡献者的比例。关注行业规范、按团队类型(工程、产品等)的变化以及扩展建议。提供引用和比较表。

useCase.zh: 研究有效的技能提升项目

prompt.en: I'm designing an upskilling program for a [insert team type, e.g., customer support team]. Find case studies or frameworks from companies that have implemented successful internal training programs. Include how they measured success, duration, and tools used. Summarize in 3–4 paragraphs with links.
prompt.zh: 我正在为[插入团队类型,例如客户支持团队]设计技能提升项目。查找已实施成功内部培训项目的公司的案例研究或框架。包括他们如何衡量成功、持续时间和使用的工具。用3-4段总结并附链接。

prompt.en: I'm helping shape our team's DEI goals. Research how leading companies in [insert industry] structure their DEI initiatives at the team level. Include examples of KPIs, training, and rituals. Return a comparison table with links.
prompt.zh: 我正在帮助制定团队的多元化、公平性和包容性(DEI)目标。研究[插入行业]领先公司如何在团队层面构建其DEI计划。包括关键绩效指标、培训和仪式的示例。返回带链接的比较表。

useCase.zh: 了解倦怠风险和缓解措施

prompt.en: I'm seeing signs of burnout on my team. Research recent studies or expert guidance on recognizing burnout in knowledge workers and preventing escalation. Summarize key risk factors and recommend a 3-part action plan with citations.
prompt.zh: 我看到团队出现倦怠迹象。研究关于识别知识工作者倦怠和防止恶化的最新研究或专家指导。总结关键风险因素并推荐带引用的3部分行动计划。

description.en: ChatGPT creates compelling visual metaphors and artifacts to communicate team culture, priorities, and change journeys.
description.zh: ChatGPT创建引人注目的视觉隐喻和工件,以传达团队文化、优先事项和变革旅程。
