prompt.en: Design a visual metaphor for a team's growth journey over a year. Include representations of challenges, milestones, and collaboration. Style should be inspiring, like a timeline or path through a landscape.
prompt.zh: 为团队一年的成长旅程设计视觉隐喻。包括挑战、里程碑和协作的表现形式。风格应该是鼓舞人心的,像时间轴或穿越景观的路径。

prompt.en: Design an image that represents our team culture. Our values are [insert 3–5 values, e.g. curiosity, impact, accountability]. Use icons or illustrations to match each value, and organize in a clean layout suitable for a wiki or mural board.
prompt.zh: 设计一张代表我们团队文化的图像。我们的价值观是[插入3-5个价值观,例如好奇心、影响力、责任心]。使用图标或插图来匹配每个价值观,并以适合wiki或壁画板的整洁布局组织。

prompt.en: Create a visual dashboard or poster that shows our team's three strategic priorities this quarter: [insert priorities]. Make it visually engaging and easy to present in an all-hands slide.
prompt.zh: 创建一个可视化仪表板或海报,展示我们团队本季度的三个战略优先事项:[插入优先事项]。使其在视觉上引人入胜,并易于在全员大会幻灯片中展示。

prompt.en: Help me write a performance review for [employee name/role]. Consider these accomplishments: [list achievements], areas for improvement: [list areas], and goals for next period. Make it constructive, specific, and balanced.
prompt.zh: 帮助我为[员工姓名/角色]撰写绩效评估。考虑这些成就:[列出成就]、需要改进的领域:[列出领域]以及下一期的目标。使其具有建设性、具体且平衡。

prompt.en: Draft a team announcement about [topic]. Include context, key information, impact on the team, next steps, and encourage questions. Keep it clear, professional, and appropriately toned for [situation type].
prompt.zh: 起草关于[主题]的团队公告。包括背景、关键信息、对团队的影响、后续步骤,并鼓励提问。保持清晰、专业,语气适合[情况类型]。

prompt.en: Create a meeting agenda for [meeting purpose] with [attendees]. Include objectives, discussion topics, time allocations, pre-work requirements, and desired outcomes. Make it actionable and time-efficient.
prompt.zh: 为[会议目的]创建与[参与者]的会议议程。包括目标、讨论主题、时间分配、会前准备要求和期望结果。使其可操作且高效。

prompt.en: Help me prepare for a difficult conversation with [person] about [issue]. Provide talking points, potential reactions, de-escalation strategies, and desired outcomes. Keep it empathetic but professional.
prompt.zh: 帮助我准备与[人员]就[问题]进行的困难对话。提供谈话要点、潜在反应、降温策略和期望结果。保持同理心但专业。

prompt.en: Help me delegate [task/project] to [team member]. Create clear instructions including objectives, deliverables, timeline, resources available, authority level, and success criteria.
prompt.zh: 帮助我将[任务/项目]委派给[团队成员]。创建清晰的指示,包括目标、可交付成果、时间表、可用资源、授权级别和成功标准。

prompt.en: Suggest approaches to resolve this team conflict: [describe conflict]. Include root cause analysis, mediation strategies, communication techniques, and steps to rebuild team dynamics.
prompt.zh: 建议解决此团队冲突的方法:[描述冲突]。包括根本原因分析、调解策略、沟通技巧以及重建团队动力的步骤。

prompt.en: Suggest team building activities for [team size/type] with goals of [objectives]. Consider budget, time constraints, remote/hybrid considerations, and diverse team preferences.
prompt.zh: 为[团队规模/类型]建议团队建设活动,目标是[目标]。考虑预算、时间限制、远程/混合工作考虑因素和多样化的团队偏好。

prompt.en: Help me create a project timeline for [project]. Include key milestones, dependencies, resource allocation, buffer time, and risk mitigation. Timeline should span [duration].
prompt.zh: 帮助我为[项目]创建项目时间表。包括关键里程碑、依赖关系、资源分配、缓冲时间和风险缓解。时间表应跨越[持续时间]。

prompt.en: Help me give constructive feedback to [person] about [behavior/performance issue]. Use specific examples, focus on impact, suggest improvements, and maintain relationship. Follow best practices for feedback delivery.
prompt.zh: 帮助我向[人员]提供关于[行为/绩效问题]的建设性反馈。使用具体示例,关注影响,建议改进,并维护关系。遵循反馈交付的最佳实践。

prompt.en: Help me prioritize these team tasks: [list tasks]. Consider urgency, importance, dependencies, resource availability, and strategic alignment. Provide a prioritized list with rationale.
prompt.zh: 帮助我优先处理这些团队任务:[列出任务]。考虑紧急性、重要性、依赖关系、资源可用性和战略一致性。提供有理由的优先列表。

prompt.en: Prepare a one-on-one meeting structure with [team member]. Include check-in questions, development discussion topics, feedback opportunities, and goal setting. Make it employee-focused and productive.
prompt.zh: 准备与[团队成员]的一对一会谈结构。包括签到问题、发展讨论主题、反馈机会和目标设定。使其以员工为中心且富有成效。

prompt.en: Create a job description for [job title]. Include role summary, key responsibilities, required qualifications, preferred skills, reporting structure, and what makes this opportunity compelling.
prompt.zh: 为[职位名称]创建职位描述。包括角色摘要、关键职责、必需资格、首选技能、汇报结构以及使此机会引人注目的原因。

prompt.en: Help me address scope creep in [project]. Analyze current scope vs. original plan, assess impact, create response strategy, and draft communication to stakeholders about scope management.
prompt.zh: 帮助我解决[项目]中的范围蔓延问题。分析当前范围与原始计划,评估影响,制定响应策略,并起草关于范围管理的利益相关者沟通。

prompt.en: Help me develop SMART goals for my team focusing on [areas]. Align with organizational objectives, ensure measurability, set realistic timelines, and create accountability framework.
prompt.zh: 帮助我为我的团队制定关注[领域]的SMART目标。与组织目标保持一致,确保可衡量性,设定现实的时间表,并创建问责框架。

prompt.en: Guide me through addressing underperformance with [employee]. Include documentation approach, performance improvement plan elements, support resources, timeline, and consequences if improvement doesn't occur.
prompt.zh: 指导我处理[员工]的绩效不佳问题。包括文档方法、绩效改进计划要素、支持资源、时间表以及如果没有改进的后果。

prompt.en: Create a sprint retrospective format for [team]. Include activities for reflection, celebrating wins, identifying improvements, action item creation, and follow-up mechanisms. Keep it engaging and productive.
prompt.zh: 为[团队]创建冲刺回顾格式。包括反思活动、庆祝胜利、识别改进、创建行动项和后续机制。保持参与性和生产力。

prompt.en: Help me communicate [organizational change] to my team. Address the what, why, when, and how. Anticipate concerns, provide reassurance, outline support available, and encourage dialogue.
prompt.zh: 帮助我向团队沟通[组织变革]。解决什么、为什么、何时和如何的问题。预期关注点,提供保证,概述可用支持,并鼓励对话。

prompt.en: Help me define and track team performance metrics for [team/department]. Identify KPIs, measurement methods, reporting frequency, target benchmarks, and how to use data for improvement.
prompt.zh: 帮助我为[团队/部门]定义和跟踪团队绩效指标。识别关键绩效指标、测量方法、报告频率、目标基准以及如何使用数据进行改进。

prompt.en: Create a 30-60-90 day onboarding plan for [role]. Include orientation activities, training requirements, relationship building, early wins, milestones, and success metrics for each phase.
prompt.zh: 为[角色]创建30-60-90天的入职计划。包括入职培训活动、培训要求、关系建立、早期成功、里程碑以及每个阶段的成功指标。

prompt.en: Help me build a case for a budget increase for [purpose]. Include current situation, business justification, expected ROI, risk of not funding, implementation plan, and specific amount requested.
prompt.zh: 帮助我为[目的]建立预算增加的理由。包括当前情况、业务理由、预期投资回报率、不资助的风险、实施计划和所需的具体金额。

summary.en: Equips leaders with ready-to-use prompts for research, analysis, communication, and strategic visualization to drive informed decision-making and alignment.
summary.zh: 此提示包为高管提供高层次提示词,涵盖战略规划、市场分析、投资者沟通、组织设计和数据驱动决策。它支持董事会准备、竞争情报和领导力沟通。

description.en: ChatGPT researches capital flows, valuation, sentiment, and transaction benchmarks to inform executive and investor decisions. Use deep research for deeper real-time insights.
description.zh: ChatGPT提供市场研究、竞争分析和战略情景规划。使用深度研究和网页搜索获得全面的市场洞察。

prompt.en: I'm preparing for our investor update. Research the latest funding and market trends in [industry]. Focus on valuation benchmarks, risk sentiment, and notable exits. Present in a concise brief with sources.
prompt.zh: 我正在准备投资者更新报告。研究[行业]的最新融资和市场趋势。关注估值基准、风险情绪和值得注意的退出。以简明摘要形式呈现并附来源。

prompt.en: Research current investor sentiment for companies in the [industry] space. Pull insights from earnings calls, investor letters, and analyst notes. Focus on risk appetite, funding trends, and growth expectations. Provide a 1-page briefing with source links.
prompt.zh: 研究[行业]领域公司的当前投资者情绪。从财报电话会、投资者信函和分析师报告中提取洞察。关注风险偏好、融资趋势和增长预期。提供带来源链接的1页简报。

prompt.en: Conduct research on executive compensation benchmarks for [title, e.g. CFO] at [company size and industry]. Include total compensation breakdowns, geographic variations, and trends across public/private companies. Summarize in a 1-page brief with data tables and citations.
prompt.zh: 对[公司规模和行业]的[职位,例如CFO]进行高管薪酬基准研究。包括总薪酬细分、地理差异以及上市/私营公司的趋势。用带数据表和引用的1页简报总结。

useCase.en: Evaluate M&A opportunities in a sector
useCase.zh: 评估行业内的并购机会

prompt.en: I'm evaluating M&A options in the [sector/vertical]. Research recent acquisitions (past 24 months), typical deal sizes, common targets, and integration outcomes. Provide company examples, risks, and strategic rationale. Format as an investor-style briefing.
prompt.zh: 我正在评估[行业/垂直领域]的并购选项。研究近期收购(过去24个月)、典型交易规模、常见目标和整合结果。提供公司示例、风险和战略理由。以投资者风格的简报形式呈现。

useCase.zh: 评估[您的行业]的未来趋势

prompt.en: I'm an executive at [company/industry]. Conduct deep research on 3–5 emerging trends in [industry/topic] over the next 3 years. Include industry-specific examples, expert citations, and potential implications for strategy and talent planning. Present as an executive summary with bullet points and links to sources.
prompt.zh: 我是[公司/行业]的高管。对未来3年[行业/主题]的3-5个新兴趋势进行深入研究。包括行业特定示例、专家引用以及对战略和人才规划的潜在影响。以带项目符号和来源链接的执行摘要形式呈现。

description.en: ChatGPT helps craft clear, audience-tailored executive narratives and internal communication assets to drive alignment and engagement. Use canvas for real-time editing.
description.zh: ChatGPT协助准备投资者更新、董事会材料和高管演示。使用画布功能进行实时编辑。

prompt.en: Help me draft a compelling vision statement for our [company/team/initiative]. Our focus areas are: [insert key goals, values, or direction]. Make it inspiring, concise, and easy to communicate across departments.
prompt.zh: 帮助我为[公司/团队/计划]起草引人注目的愿景声明。我们的重点领域是:[插入关键目标、价值观或方向]。使其鼓舞人心、简洁,并易于在各部门之间传达。

useCase.zh: 生成全员大会谈话要点

prompt.en: I need talking points for an upcoming company-wide town hall. The theme is [insert theme or announcement]. Make it engaging, clear, and forward-looking. Limit to 5 minutes of content.
prompt.zh: 我需要即将举行的全公司全员大会的谈话要点。主题是[插入主题或公告]。使其引人入胜、清晰且面向未来。限制为5分钟的内容。

prompt.en: Help me design a new internal communications plan for [company or team]. We're trying to improve alignment, morale, and transparency. Suggest 3 guiding principles and a simple comms calendar.
prompt.zh: 帮助我为[公司或团队]设计新的内部沟通计划。我们试图改善一致性、士气和透明度。建议3个指导原则和简单的沟通日历。

prompt.en: I'm planning communications for a reorg. Provide a step-by-step message plan by audience type (execs, managers, all staff). Include tone guidelines and delivery format per message.
prompt.zh: 我正在规划重组的沟通计划。按受众类型(高管、管理者、全体员工)提供分步消息计划。包括每条消息的语气指南和交付格式。

prompt.en: Help me draft a succession planning memo for our [leadership team/board]. Include reasoning, timing, and a transparent outline of next steps for internal comms.
prompt.zh: 帮助我为[领导团队/董事会]起草继任规划备忘录。包括理由、时间安排以及内部沟通后续步骤的透明概述。

description.en: ChatGPT helps develop multi-horizon strategies and structured comparisons to guide prioritization and resource allocation. Use a reasoning model for more strategic insights.
description.zh: ChatGPT指导组织结构、领导力发展和文化计划。

prompt.en: We're revisiting our pricing strategy for [product/service]. Based on [insert context: goals, customer segments, competitive positioning], suggest 2–3 pricing models and pros/cons of each.
prompt.zh: 我们正在重新审视[产品/服务]的定价策略。基于[插入背景:目标、客户细分、竞争定位],建议2-3种定价模型及其优缺点。

prompt.en: Given our goals [insert business goals], identify 3 high-potential growth levers and estimate effort vs. impact. Include a table with short descriptions and trade-offs.
prompt.zh: 根据我们的目标[插入业务目标],识别3个高潜力增长杠杆并估算努力与影响。包括带简短描述和权衡的表格。

prompt.en: We are considering entering [new market/region]. Based on current economic, legal, and competitive factors, summarize key risks and mitigation strategies in bullet format.
prompt.zh: 我们正在考虑进入[新市场/地区]。基于当前经济、法律和竞争因素,以项目符号格式总结关键风险和缓解策略。

prompt.en: We’re choosing between [Option A] and [Option B] for our next big investment. Compare trade-offs across cost, time, team capacity, and customer impact. Recommend based on goal fit.
prompt.zh: We’re choosing between [Option A] and [Option B] for our next big investment. Compare trade-offs across cost, time, team capacity, and customer impact. Recommend based on goal fit.

prompt.en: Based on these business priorities [insert high-level goals], help me develop a high-level 3-year strategy. Include major focus areas, risks, and milestones per year.
prompt.zh: 基于这些业务优先事项[插入高层目标],帮助我制定高层次的3年战略。包括每年的主要关注领域、风险和里程碑。

description.en: ChatGPT interprets operational and financial datasets to surface trends, diagnose issues, forecast outcomes, and optimize initiatives.
description.zh: ChatGPT分析财务数据、关键绩效指标和业务指标以支持决策。

useCase.en: Identify top and bottom performing segments
useCase.zh: 识别表现最好和最差的细分市场

prompt.en: This is a dataset of performance across [regions/products/customers]. Identify which segments are over- and under-performing relative to the average. Show the metrics driving this and recommend 2 actions based on the findings.
prompt.zh: 这是跨[地区/产品/客户]的绩效数据集。识别哪些细分市场相对于平均水平表现过高或过低。显示驱动因素的指标并基于发现推荐2个行动。

prompt.en: I’m reviewing performance data for Q[insert quarter]. Analyze this dataset [upload CSV] for key trends in revenue, churn, and customer acquisition. Highlight 3 insights I should share with the board and suggest follow-up questions I should ask.
prompt.zh: I’m reviewing performance data for Q[insert quarter]. Analyze this dataset [upload CSV] for key trends in revenue, churn, and customer acquisition. Highlight 3 insights I should share with the board and suggest follow-up questions I should ask.

prompt.en: I uploaded a funnel dataset showing customer journey stages. Analyze conversion rates between each stage and identify the largest drop-offs. Suggest 2–3 hypotheses and next steps to test or investigate.
prompt.zh: 我上传了显示客户旅程阶段的漏斗数据集。分析每个阶段之间的转化率并识别最大的流失点。建议2-3个假设和要测试或调查的后续步骤。

useCase.en: Forecast next quarter based on historical trends
useCase.zh: 基于历史趋势预测下一季度

prompt.en: Based on this historical data [upload], build a simple forecast for [KPI, e.g. revenue] over the next quarter. Use a basic time-series model and explain any assumptions made. Present as a short briefing I can share with my leadership team.
prompt.zh: 基于此历史数据[上传],为下一季度的[KPI,例如收入]建立简单预测。使用基本时间序列模型并解释所做的任何假设。以我可以与领导团队分享的简短简报形式呈现。

prompt.en: I uploaded a dataset of ongoing or proposed initiatives with cost, impact score, and estimated time to ROI. Help me prioritize these initiatives by building a simple scoring model and plotting effort vs. impact. Summarize the top 3 recommendations.
prompt.zh: 我上传了包含成本、影响评分和估计投资回报时间的正在进行或拟议计划的数据集。通过构建简单评分模型并绘制努力与影响来帮助我优先排序这些计划。总结前3个建议。

description.en: ChatGPT creates clear strategic diagrams, matrices, and conceptual visuals for executive presentations and storytelling.
description.zh: ChatGPT起草鼓舞人心的全公司沟通、愿景声明和变革管理消息。

prompt.en: Based on the following list of competitors and their differentiators [paste], create a 2x2 matrix plotting them by [x axis] and [y axis]. Label each quadrant and include our position.
prompt.zh: 基于以下竞争对手及其差异化因素列表[粘贴],创建一个2x2矩阵,按[x轴]和[y轴]绘制它们。标记每个象限并包括我们的位置。

prompt.en: Create a 2x2 matrix plotting companies in [industry] by [X-axis: e.g. pricing] and [Y-axis: e.g. innovation]. Label each quadrant, add 6–8 companies, and highlight where we fit. Keep it suitable for a board presentation.
prompt.zh: 创建一个2x2矩阵,按[X轴:例如定价]和[Y轴:例如创新]绘制[行业]中的公司。标记每个象限,添加6-8家公司,并突出显示我们的位置。使其适合董事会演示。

prompt.en: Create a visual timeline showing a company transformation journey from [year 1] to [year 3]. Include key milestones: strategy shifts, team growth, market expansion. Style: simple, bold, professional.
prompt.zh: 创建一个视觉时间线,展示公司从[第1年]到[第3年]的转型旅程。包括关键里程碑:战略转变、团队增长、市场扩张。风格:简单、大胆、专业。

useCase.zh: 可视化战略愿景或飞轮

prompt.en: Create a high-level strategic flywheel or vision diagram for a company focused on [industry or goal]. Show how inputs (e.g. customers, data, feedback) loop into outputs (e.g. growth, innovation). Keep it clean, modern, and executive-ready.
prompt.zh: 为专注于[行业或目标]的公司创建高层战略飞轮或愿景图。展示输入(例如客户、数据、反馈)如何循环到输出(例如增长、创新)。保持简洁、现代且适合高管。

prompt.en: Create a conceptual image of a future product vision for [industry/product]. Highlight features that reflect innovation and customer benefit. Style should be forward-looking, abstract but clear.
prompt.zh: 为[行业/产品]创建未来产品愿景的概念图像。突出反映创新和客户利益的功能。风格应面向未来、抽象但清晰。

prompt.en: Help me create a board presentation on [topic]. Include executive summary, key metrics, strategic initiatives, risks/opportunities, financial implications, and recommendations. Keep it concise and data-driven.
prompt.zh: 帮助我创建关于[主题]的董事会演示。包括执行摘要、关键指标、战略举措、风险/机遇、财务影响和建议。保持简洁和数据驱动。

prompt.en: Help me develop a strategic plan for [business area/timeframe]. Include market analysis, competitive positioning, strategic objectives, key initiatives, resource requirements, and success metrics.
prompt.zh: 帮助我为[业务领域/时间范围]制定战略计划。包括市场分析、竞争定位、战略目标、关键举措、资源需求和成功指标。

prompt.en: Analyze current market trends in [industry/sector]. Identify emerging opportunities, potential threats, competitive dynamics, technological disruptions, and implications for our business strategy.
prompt.zh: 分析[行业/部门]的当前市场趋势。识别新兴机会、潜在威胁、竞争动态、技术颠覆以及对我们业务战略的影响。

prompt.en: Help me evaluate [company] as an acquisition target. Consider strategic fit, financial performance, market position, synergies, integration challenges, valuation, and key risks.
prompt.zh: 帮助我评估[公司]作为收购目标。考虑战略契合度、财务表现、市场地位、协同效应、整合挑战、估值和关键风险。

prompt.en: Draft an investor update for [period]. Highlight business performance, key achievements, market developments, financial results, strategic progress, and outlook. Make it transparent and confidence-building.
prompt.zh: 为[期间]起草投资者更新。突出业务表现、关键成就、市场发展、财务结果、战略进展和展望。使其透明并建立信心。

prompt.en: Help me plan an organizational restructuring for [reason]. Include new structure rationale, impact analysis, transition plan, communication strategy, risk mitigation, and timeline.
prompt.zh: 帮助我为[原因]规划组织重组。包括新结构理由、影响分析、过渡计划、沟通策略、风险缓解和时间表。

prompt.en: Help me develop a crisis response plan for [crisis situation]. Include immediate actions, stakeholder communication, containment strategy, recovery plan, and long-term reputation management.
prompt.zh: 帮助我为[危机情况]制定危机应对计划。包括即时行动、利益相关者沟通、遏制策略、恢复计划和长期声誉管理。

prompt.en: Help me develop company-level OKRs for [period]. Align with strategic vision, ensure measurability, balance ambition with achievability, and cascade to departmental objectives.
prompt.zh: 帮助我为[期间]制定公司级OKR。与战略愿景保持一致,确保可衡量性,平衡雄心与可实现性,并级联到部门目标。

prompt.en: Assess this partnership opportunity with [company/organization]: [describe opportunity]. Consider strategic alignment, mutual benefits, risks, resource commitment, governance, and exit scenarios.
prompt.zh: 评估与[公司/组织]的此合作机会:[描述机会]。考虑战略一致性、互惠互利、风险、资源承诺、治理和退出情景。

prompt.en: Help me prepare for the earnings call on [date]. Include key messages, financial highlights, strategic updates, anticipated questions, talking points, and guidance on forward-looking statements.
prompt.zh: 帮助我准备[日期]的财报电话会。包括关键信息、财务亮点、战略更新、预期问题、谈话要点和前瞻性陈述指导。

prompt.en: Help me articulate and strengthen our company culture around [values/principles]. Include culture definition, behavioral examples, integration with processes, measurement approaches, and leadership modeling.
prompt.zh: 帮助我围绕[价值观/原则]阐明和加强我们的公司文化。包括文化定义、行为示例、与流程的整合、测量方法和领导力示范。

prompt.en: Create a succession plan for [role/positions]. Identify critical roles, assess internal candidates, define development needs, establish timeline, and ensure business continuity.
prompt.zh: 为[角色/职位]创建继任计划。识别关键角色,评估内部候选人,定义发展需求,建立时间表,并确保业务连续性。

prompt.en: Conduct a competitive analysis of our position in [market/segment]. Compare offerings, pricing, market share, capabilities, and customer perception. Identify competitive advantages and vulnerabilities.
prompt.zh: 对我们在[市场/细分市场]的地位进行竞争分析。比较产品、定价、市场份额、能力和客户感知。识别竞争优势和弱点。

prompt.en: Evaluate our digital transformation progress in [area]. Assess current state, identify gaps, prioritize initiatives, estimate investment needs, and define roadmap for [timeframe].
prompt.zh: 评估我们在[领域]的数字化转型进展。评估当前状态,识别差距,优先考虑举措,估算投资需求,并定义[时间范围]的路线图。

prompt.en: Help me craft a compelling vision statement and communication for [company/initiative]. Make it inspiring, clear, actionable, and aligned with stakeholder interests. Include rollout strategy.
prompt.zh: 帮助我为[公司/计划]制定引人注目的愿景声明和沟通。使其鼓舞人心、清晰、可操作,并与利益相关者的利益保持一致。包括推出策略。

prompt.en: Help me develop a capital allocation strategy for [amount/period]. Balance growth investment, shareholder returns, debt management, and strategic reserves. Consider risk-adjusted returns and strategic priorities.
prompt.zh: 帮助我为[金额/期间]制定资本配置策略。平衡增长投资、股东回报、债务管理和战略储备。考虑风险调整后的回报和战略优先事项。

prompt.en: Develop a strategy to address [regulatory change/requirement]. Assess impact, ensure compliance, identify opportunities, allocate resources, and communicate to stakeholders.
prompt.zh: 制定应对[监管变化/要求]的策略。评估影响,确保合规性,识别机会,分配资源,并向利益相关者沟通。

prompt.en: Evaluate international expansion into [market/region]. Analyze market opportunity, entry strategy, regulatory requirements, competitive landscape, resource needs, risks, and financial projections.
prompt.zh: 评估进入[市场/地区]的国际扩张。分析市场机会、进入策略、监管要求、竞争格局、资源需求、风险和财务预测。

prompt.en: Develop a stakeholder management strategy for [initiative/situation]. Map stakeholders, assess interests/influence, create engagement plan, anticipate concerns, and build coalition for success.
prompt.zh: 为[计划/情况]制定利益相关者管理策略。绘制利益相关者地图,评估兴趣/影响力,创建参与计划,预期关注点,并建立成功联盟。

prompt.en: Create an innovation strategy for [company/division]. Define innovation objectives, establish processes, allocate resources, build culture, measure outcomes, and balance core business with new ventures.
prompt.zh: 为[公司/部门]创建创新战略。定义创新目标,建立流程,分配资源,建立文化,衡量结果,并平衡核心业务与新企业。

summary.en: Finance-focused prompts designed to streamline analysis, reporting, and visualization tasks for finance leaders. It covers benchmarking, forecasting, executive communication, process optimization, and visual storytelling to support strategic decision-making.
summary.zh: 此提示包为财务团队提供专业提示词,涵盖财务分析、预算编制、合规性、报告和战略财务规划。它简化了预测、方差分析、审计准备和利益相关者财务沟通。

description.en: ChatGPT supports evaluating financial performance and market positioning through benchmarking, competitor research, and industry analysis. Use web search or deep research for deeper real-time insights.
description.zh: ChatGPT协助预算编制、预测和财务建模任务。

prompt.en: Benchmark our financial performance against companies in the [insert industry] sector. Use public data to compare gross margin, net profit, and CAC. Present results in a table with source links.
prompt.zh: 将我们的财务绩效与[插入行业]部门的公司进行基准比较。使用公共数据比较毛利率、净利润和CAC。以带来源链接的表格形式呈现结果。

prompt.en: I'm a finance lead at [insert company or industry]. Research current SG&A and R&D expense ratios for 5 comparable companies in the [insert sector, e.g., SaaS, manufacturing, healthcare]. Provide a table with metrics, source links, and a short analysis of how we compare.
prompt.zh: 我是[插入公司或行业]的财务负责人。研究[插入部门,例如SaaS、制造业、医疗保健]中5家可比公司的当前SG&A和R&D费用率。提供包含指标、来源链接和我们比较情况的简短分析的表格。

prompt.en: I'm a CFO preparing for our next fundraising round. Research recent funding rounds (past 12 months) in [insert industry]. Summarize deal sizes, valuations, lead investors, and positioning. Format as a briefing memo with source citations and clear bullet-point insights.
prompt.zh: 我是CFO,正在准备下一轮融资。研究[插入行业]的近期融资轮次(过去12个月)。总结交易规模、估值、主要投资者和定位。以带来源引用和清晰要点洞察的简报备忘录格式呈现。

prompt.en: I manage global finance compliance. Research and compare corporate tax rates and reporting requirements in [insert countries]. Focus on tax incentives, reporting thresholds, and penalties. Deliver a comparison chart with links to official sources.
prompt.zh: 我管理全球财务合规。研究并比较[插入国家]的公司税率和报告要求。关注税收激励、报告门槛和处罚。提供带官方来源链接的比较图表。

prompt.en: I'm updating our ESG financial strategy. Research how leading companies in [insert industry] integrate ESG into financial planning and disclosures. Summarize 3–5 examples with their KPIs, reporting cadence, and financial impact. Include references.
prompt.zh: 我正在更新ESG财务策略。研究[插入行业]领先公司如何将ESG整合到财务规划和披露中。总结3-5个示例及其KPI、报告节奏和财务影响。包括参考文献。

description.en: ChatGPT guides revenue forecasting, budget planning, and scenario modeling to inform strategic decisions. Upload data for deeper analysis and use a reasoning model for more strategic insights.
description.zh: ChatGPT创建财务报告、仪表板和数据可视化以进行利益相关者沟通。

prompt.en: Forecast next quarter’s revenue based on the past 6 quarters of data. Use the trends from our [insert dataset or industry] to explain your reasoning. Present the forecast in a table and write a short executive summary.
prompt.zh: Forecast next quarter’s revenue based on the past 6 quarters of data. Use the trends from our [insert dataset or industry] to explain your reasoning. Present the forecast in a table and write a short executive summary.

prompt.en: Help me draft budget assumptions for our next annual plan. Context: [insert department/region/product info]. Output should include key assumptions, rationale, and any dependencies.
prompt.zh: 帮助我为下一个年度计划起草预算假设。背景:[插入部门/地区/产品信息]。输出应包括关键假设、理由和任何依赖关系。

prompt.en: Model 3 cash flow scenarios based on these variables: [insert inputs such as revenue range, delays, or costs]. Output as a table with assumptions, key drivers, and estimated cash impact.
prompt.zh: 基于这些变量建模3个现金流场景:[插入输入,如收入范围、延迟或成本]。以表格形式输出,包括假设、关键驱动因素和估计现金影响。

useCase.zh: 进行工具投资回报率分析

prompt.en: Conduct an ROI analysis for a new [insert software or tool] we’re considering. Context: [insert usage or pricing data]. Output should include payback period, assumptions, and a short risk assessment.
prompt.zh: Conduct an ROI analysis for a new [insert software or tool] we’re considering. Context: [insert usage or pricing data]. Output should include payback period, assumptions, and a short risk assessment.

prompt.en: Compare 3 potential pricing strategies for our [insert product or service]. Use prior pricing data from [insert past year] for context. Output should be a side-by-side comparison table with pros, cons, and estimated impact.
prompt.zh: 比较[插入产品或服务]的3个潜在定价策略。使用[插入过去年份]的先前定价数据作为背景。输出应为并排比较表,包括优缺点和估计影响。

description.en: ChatGPT supports executive communications, board updates, and simplifying financial information for diverse audiences. Use canvas for real-time editing.
description.zh: ChatGPT支持审计准备、合规检查和监管研究。使用网页搜索获得最新的监管指南。

useCase.zh: 准备董事会会议谈话要点

prompt.en: Draft financial talking points for an upcoming board meeting. Use our [insert Q2 results or P&L summary] as input. Write the talking points in bullet format, focusing on topline metrics and risk/upsides.
prompt.zh: 为即将召开的董事会会议起草财务谈话要点。使用[插入Q2结果或损益表摘要]作为输入。以项目符号格式撰写谈话要点,关注顶线指标和风险/上行空间。

prompt.en: Write a summary for our next investor update. Use highlights from [insert performance report or fundraising update]. Format the output as a concise executive email suitable for external stakeholders.
prompt.zh: 为下一次投资者更新撰写摘要。使用[插入绩效报告或融资更新]的亮点。将输出格式化为适合外部利益相关者的简洁执行电子邮件。

prompt.en: Draft the financial performance section for our next QBR deck. Use these inputs: [insert Q2 revenue, margin trends, notable cost changes]. Output as slide bullets with 1–2 takeaway lines.
prompt.zh: 为下一个QBR演示起草财务绩效部分。使用这些输入:[插入Q2收入、利润率趋势、值得注意的成本变化]。以幻灯片要点形式输出,附带1-2行要点。

prompt.en: Translate this variance analysis into a manager-friendly summary. Source: [insert analysis]. Write in plain language with a brief explanation of why each variance occurred.
prompt.zh: 将此方差分析转换为管理者友好的摘要。来源:[插入分析]。用通俗语言撰写,简要解释每个方差发生的原因。

prompt.en: Summarize key findings from our internal audit. Use this document: [insert findings]. Output should be a summary for executives, with 3 themes and recommended next steps.
prompt.zh: 总结内部审计的关键发现。使用此文档:[插入发现]。输出应为面向高管的摘要,包含3个主题和建议的后续步骤。

description.en: ChatGPT analyzes cost structures, identifies efficiency opportunities, and strengthens financial operations. Use a reasoning model for more strategic insights.
description.zh: ChatGPT识别成本节约机会并分析支出模式。

prompt.en: Identify cost reduction opportunities from our recent budget report. Use the breakdown from [insert cost center or department] to evaluate. Provide a table with opportunities, projected savings, and any potential risks.
prompt.zh: 从最近的预算报告中识别成本削减机会。使用[插入成本中心或部门]的细分进行评估。提供包含机会、预计节省和潜在风险的表格。

prompt.en: Evaluate the financial and strategic fit of an M&A target. Use this context: [insert company profile or key metrics]. Output should be a table of pros/cons and a 3-paragraph summary of risk/reward.
prompt.zh: 评估并购目标的财务和战略契合度。使用此背景:[插入公司概况或关键指标]。输出应为优缺点表格和3段风险/回报摘要。

prompt.en: Review our current accounting close checklist and suggest improvements. Use this documentation: [insert SOP or task list]. Output should highlight bottlenecks and recommend process updates.
prompt.zh: 审查我们当前的会计结账检查清单并提出改进建议。使用此文档:[插入SOP或任务列表]。输出应突出瓶颈并推荐流程更新。

useCase.zh: 审查供应商付款以进行整合

prompt.en: Analyze vendor payments in this data [upload file]. Identify top 10 vendors by spend, spot any duplication (e.g., similar vendor names), and recommend vendors to consolidate. Output a table and short cost-reduction summary.
prompt.zh: 分析此数据中的供应商付款[上传文件]。按支出识别前10名供应商,发现任何重复(例如相似的供应商名称),并推荐要整合的供应商。输出表格和简短的成本削减摘要。

prompt.en: I'm leading a finance initiative to cut procurement costs. Research strategies used by Fortune 500 companies to reduce procurement spend without harming supplier relationships. Present 3–5 tactics with cost impact examples and cited sources.
prompt.zh: 我正在领导削减采购成本的财务计划。研究财富500强公司在不损害供应商关系的情况下减少采购支出的策略。提出3-5种策略,附带成本影响示例和引用来源。

description.en: ChatGPT creates visual representations of financial data, processes, and strategic insights for clarity and impact. Create an image in ChatGPT for a custom visual.
description.zh: ChatGPT指导投资评估、定价策略和财务风险评估。使用推理模型进行复杂的财务分析。

prompt.en: Create an image of a revenue growth funnel with labeled stages: Acquisition → Activation → Revenue → Retention → Expansion. Use a clean, modern style suitable for an executive finance presentation. Include icons for each stage.
prompt.zh: 创建收入增长漏斗图像,标记阶段:获取 → 激活 → 收入 → 保留 → 扩展。使用适合高管财务演示的简洁、现代风格。为每个阶段包含图标。

useCase.zh: 说明预算规划工作流程

prompt.en: Create a horizontal process flow diagram showing a budget planning cycle: Forecasting → Review → Stakeholder Input → Approval → Tracking → Adjustment. Use corporate-style visuals with subtle color and labels.
prompt.zh: 创建水平流程图,显示预算规划周期:预测 → 审查 → 利益相关者输入 → 批准 → 跟踪 → 调整。使用带有微妙色彩和标签的企业风格视觉效果。

prompt.en: Create a visual showing how ESG initiatives can impact finance metrics. Show links between sustainability investments and cost savings, risk mitigation, and investor interest. Use a modern, green-themed design with arrows.
prompt.zh: 创建显示ESG计划如何影响财务指标的视觉效果。显示可持续性投资与成本节约、风险缓解和投资者兴趣之间的联系。使用带箭头的现代绿色主题设计。

prompt.en: Generate a conceptual image of a finance executive dashboard showing high-level KPIs: Revenue, Gross Margin, Burn Rate, Runway, and Budget vs. Actual. Use a clean layout with panels and placeholder numbers.
prompt.zh: 生成财务高管仪表板的概念图像,显示高级KPI:收入、毛利率、燃烧率、跑道和预算与实际。使用带面板和占位符数字的简洁布局。

prompt.en: Help me create a budget forecast for [department/period]. Include revenue projections, expense categories, headcount planning, capital expenditures, and key assumptions. Provide variance analysis framework.
prompt.zh: 帮助我为[部门/期间]创建预算预测。包括收入预测、费用类别、人员规划、资本支出和关键假设。提供差异分析框架。

prompt.en: Analyze the variance between actual and budget for [period/category]: Actual: [amount], Budget: [amount]. Identify root causes, quantify impact, and recommend corrective actions.
prompt.zh: 分析[期间/类别]实际与预算之间的差异:实际:[金额],预算:[金额]。识别根本原因,量化影响,并建议纠正措施。

prompt.en: Help me build a financial model for [project/business]. Include revenue drivers, cost structure, cash flow projections, break-even analysis, sensitivity testing, and key financial metrics.
prompt.zh: 帮助我为[项目/业务]构建财务模型。包括收入驱动因素、成本结构、现金流预测、盈亏平衡分析、敏感性测试和关键财务指标。

prompt.en: Evaluate this investment opportunity: [describe investment]. Calculate NPV, IRR, payback period, and risk-adjusted return. Consider strategic fit, market conditions, and alternative uses of capital.
prompt.zh: 评估此投资机会:[描述投资]。计算净现值、内部收益率、投资回收期和风险调整后回报。考虑战略契合度、市场条件和资本的替代用途。

prompt.en: Create a month-end close checklist for [month]. Include reconciliation requirements, accrual entries, journal entry deadlines, reporting deliverables, and key review points.
prompt.zh: 为[月份]创建月末结账清单。包括对账要求、应计分录、日记账分录截止日期、报告可交付成果和关键审查点。

prompt.en: Analyze our cash flow situation: [provide details]. Suggest strategies to improve cash conversion cycle, manage working capital, optimize payment terms, and maintain adequate liquidity.
prompt.zh: 分析我们的现金流状况:[提供详细信息]。建议改善现金转换周期、管理营运资本、优化付款条款和维持充足流动性的策略。

prompt.en: Perform financial ratio analysis for [company/period]. Calculate and interpret liquidity, profitability, efficiency, and leverage ratios. Compare to industry benchmarks and historical trends.
prompt.zh: 为[公司/期间]执行财务比率分析。计算和解释流动性、盈利能力、效率和杠杆比率。与行业基准和历史趋势进行比较。

prompt.en: Evaluate pricing strategy for [product/service]. Consider cost structure, competitive pricing, value perception, market elasticity, and profit margin targets. Recommend optimal pricing approach.
prompt.zh: 评估[产品/服务]的定价策略。考虑成本结构、竞争定价、价值感知、市场弹性和利润率目标。推荐最佳定价方法。

prompt.en: Develop a cost reduction plan to achieve [target savings]. Analyze spend categories, identify reduction opportunities, assess impact on operations, prioritize initiatives, and create implementation roadmap.
prompt.zh: 制定成本削减计划以实现[目标节省]。分析支出类别,识别削减机会,评估对运营的影响,优先考虑举措,并创建实施路线图。

prompt.en: Analyze our capital structure: [provide details]. Evaluate debt-to-equity ratio, cost of capital, financial flexibility, and optimal capital mix. Consider refinancing opportunities and strategic implications.
prompt.zh: 分析我们的资本结构:[提供详细信息]。评估债务权益比、资本成本、财务灵活性和最佳资本组合。考虑再融资机会和战略影响。

prompt.en: Create audit documentation for [area/account]. Include supporting schedules, reconciliations, transaction samples, control documentation, and explanation of significant items or changes.
prompt.zh: 为[领域/账户]创建审计文档。包括支持性明细表、对账、交易样本、控制文档以及重大项目或变更的解释。

prompt.en: Build a revenue forecast for [period/product]. Consider historical trends, pipeline analysis, market conditions, seasonality, pricing changes, and growth initiatives. Include best/worst case scenarios.
prompt.zh: 为[期间/产品]构建收入预测。考虑历史趋势、管道分析、市场条件、季节性、定价变化和增长举措。包括最佳/最坏情况。

prompt.en: Conduct profitability analysis for [product/segment/customer]. Calculate gross margin, contribution margin, and operating profit. Identify improvement opportunities and strategic recommendations.
prompt.zh: 对[产品/细分市场/客户]进行盈利能力分析。计算毛利率、贡献边际和营业利润。识别改进机会和战略建议。

prompt.en: Design a financial KPI dashboard for [stakeholder/purpose]. Select relevant metrics, define calculations, establish targets, determine frequency, and create visualization recommendations.
prompt.zh: 为[利益相关者/目的]设计财务关键指标仪表板。选择相关指标,定义计算,建立目标,确定频率,并创建可视化建议。

prompt.en: Compare lease vs. buy options for [asset]. Analyze total cost of ownership, cash flow impact, tax implications, accounting treatment, flexibility, and strategic considerations.
prompt.zh: 比较[资产]的租赁与购买选项。分析总拥有成本、现金流影响、税务影响、会计处理、灵活性和战略考虑。

prompt.en: Assess our foreign exchange exposure: [provide details]. Recommend hedging strategies, evaluate derivative instruments, estimate potential impact, and suggest risk management policies.
prompt.zh: 评估我们的外汇风险敞口:[提供详细信息]。推荐对冲策略,评估衍生工具,估算潜在影响,并建议风险管理政策。

prompt.en: Calculate break-even point for [product/business]. Identify fixed costs, variable costs per unit, price point. Determine break-even volume and revenue. Analyze sensitivity to key assumptions.
prompt.zh: 计算[产品/业务]的盈亏平衡点。识别固定成本、单位可变成本、价格点。确定盈亏平衡量和收入。分析对关键假设的敏感性。

prompt.en: Review transfer pricing for inter-company transactions: [describe transactions]. Ensure arm's length pricing, tax compliance, documentation requirements, and alignment with business strategy.
prompt.zh: 审查公司间交易的转让定价:[描述交易]。确保公平交易定价、税务合规、文档要求以及与业务战略的一致性。

prompt.en: Calculate working capital requirements for [period/growth scenario]. Analyze receivables, inventory, payables cycles. Estimate funding needs and suggest optimization strategies.
prompt.zh: 计算[期间/增长情景]的营运资金需求。分析应收账款、库存、应付账款周期。估算资金需求并建议优化策略。

prompt.en: Prepare investor-facing financial metrics for [period]. Include revenue growth, EBITDA, cash flow, customer acquisition costs, LTV, retention rates, and other relevant SaaS/industry metrics.
prompt.zh: 为[期间]准备面向投资者的财务指标。包括收入增长、息税折旧摊销前利润、现金流、客户获取成本、生命周期价值、留存率和其他相关SaaS/行业指标。

summary.en: Prompts for marketing and brand teams to streamline strategy, content creation, and performance analysis. It covers campaign planning, competitor research, creative development, data-driven insights, and visual brand communication to accelerate high-impact marketing tasks.
summary.zh: 此提示包为营销团队提供全面的提示词,涵盖内容创作、活动策略、受众研究、SEO、社交媒体和绩效分析。它简化了文案撰写、品牌定位、竞争情报和营销自动化任务。

description.en: ChatGPT supports building, organizing, and brainstorming marketing campaigns. Use a reasoning model for strategic brainstorming.
description.zh: ChatGPT支持构建、组织和头脑风暴营销活动。使用推理模型进行战略性头脑风暴。

prompt.en: Build a timeline for our upcoming multi-channel campaign. Key dates and milestones are: [insert info]. Output as a horizontal timeline with phases, owners, and deadlines.
prompt.zh: 为即将进行的多渠道活动构建时间线。关键日期和里程碑是:[插入信息]。以水平时间线形式输出,包含阶段、负责人和截止日期。

prompt.en: Brainstorm 5 creative campaign ideas for our upcoming [event/launch]. The audience is [insert target], and our goal is [insert goal]. Include a theme, tagline, and 1-2 core tactics per idea.
prompt.zh: 为即将到来的[活动/发布]头脑风暴5个创意活动想法。受众是[插入目标],我们的目标是[插入目标]。每个想法包括主题、标语和1-2个核心策略。

prompt.en: Create a creative brief for our next paid media campaign. Here's the goal, audience, and offer: [insert info]. Include sections for objective, audience insights, tone, assets needed, and KPIs.
prompt.zh: 为下一个付费媒体活动创建创意简报。目标、受众和优惠是:[插入信息]。包括目标、受众洞察、语气、所需资产和KPI的部分。

prompt.en: Build a messaging framework for a new product. The product details are: [insert info]. Output a table with 3 pillars: key benefits, proof points, and emotional triggers.
prompt.zh: 为新产品构建信息框架。产品详情是:[插入信息]。输出包含3个支柱的表格:关键利益、证明点和情感触发点。

prompt.en: Create a customer journey map for our [product/service]. Our typical customer is [insert profile]. Break it into stages, goals, touchpoints, and potential pain points per stage. Output as a table.
prompt.zh: 为我们的[产品/服务]创建客户旅程图。我们的典型客户是[插入档案]。将其分解为各阶段的目标、接触点和潜在痛点。以表格形式输出。

description.en: ChatGPT can support researching competitor analysis, benchmarks, and emerging trends. Use web search or deep research for deeper real-time insights.
description.zh: ChatGPT支持竞争对手分析、基准研究和新兴趋势研究。使用网页搜索或深度研究获得更深入的实时洞察。

prompt.en: Research how top 5 competitors structure their blog content strategy. Include tone, topics, frequency, SEO focus, and CTAs. Provide URLs, takeaways, and a table summarizing common and standout tactics.
prompt.zh: 研究前5名竞争对手如何构建博客内容策略。包括语气、主题、频率、SEO焦点和CTA。提供URL、要点和总结常见和突出策略的表格。

useCase.en: Research emerging trends in buyer behavior
useCase.zh: 研究买家行为的新兴趋势

prompt.en: Research 2024 trends in how [type] buyers research and evaluate [industry] products. Include behavior shifts, content preferences, and channel usage. Cite sources and format as a short briefing with bullet-point insights.
prompt.zh: 研究2024年[类型]买家如何研究和评估[行业]产品的趋势。包括行为转变、内容偏好和渠道使用情况。引用来源并以带要点洞察的简短简报格式呈现。

prompt.en: Research typical CTRs, CPCs, and conversion rates for digital campaigns targeting [location] in 2024. Focus on [ad channels]. Include source links and a table comparing each metric by country.
prompt.zh: 研究2024年针对[地点]的数字活动的典型CTR、CPC和转化率。关注[广告渠道]。包括来源链接和按国家比较每个指标的表格。

useCase.zh: 研究行业活动竞争对手存在

prompt.en: Compile a summary of how our competitors are participating in [insert upcoming event]. Include booth activations, speaking sessions, sponsorships, and media coverage. Output as a table with links and analysis.
prompt.zh: 编制竞争对手如何参与[插入即将举行的活动]的摘要。包括展位激活、演讲会议、赞助和媒体报道。以带链接和分析的表格形式输出。

prompt.en: Research the most recommended [tools] for marketers by function (e.g. copywriting, planning, analytics, design). Create a table with features, pricing, pros/cons, and primary use case. Include sources.
prompt.zh: 按功能研究营销人员最推荐的[工具](例如文案撰写、规划、分析、设计)。创建包含功能、定价、优缺点和主要用例的表格。包括来源。

description.en: ChatGPT can support you with generating marketing copy, visuals, and assets. Use canvas for real-time editing.
description.zh: ChatGPT支持生成营销文案、视觉效果和资产。使用画布功能进行实时编辑。

useCase.zh: 起草产品发布电子邮件

prompt.en: Write a launch email for our new product. Use the following info about the product and target audience: [insert details]. Make it engaging and persuasive, formatted as a marketing email ready for review.
prompt.zh: 为新产品撰写发布电子邮件。使用以下产品和目标受众信息:[插入详情]。使其引人入胜且有说服力,格式化为准备审核的营销电子邮件。

prompt.en: Create 5 ad copy variations for a [channel] campaign. Here’s the campaign theme and audience info: [insert context]. Each version should test a different hook or tone.
prompt.zh: Create 5 ad copy variations for a [channel] campaign. Here’s the campaign theme and audience info: [insert context]. Each version should test a different hook or tone.

prompt.en: Draft a 3-post social media series promoting [event, product, or milestone]. Use this background for context: [paste details]. Each post should include copy and a suggested visual description.
prompt.zh: 起草推广[活动、产品或里程碑]的3篇社交媒体系列。使用此背景:[粘贴详情]。每篇帖子应包括文案和建议的视觉描述。

prompt.en: Write a customer spotlight post based on this success story: [paste key details]. Make it conversational, authentic, and aligned to our brand voice. Output as a LinkedIn post draft.
prompt.zh: 基于此成功故事撰写客户聚焦帖子:[粘贴关键详情]。使其对话化、真实,并与我们的品牌声音保持一致。以LinkedIn帖子草稿形式输出。

prompt.en: Draft a script for a 60-second explainer video about [product/topic]. Here’s what it should cover: [insert info]. Make it punchy and clear, with suggested visuals or animations.
prompt.zh: Draft a script for a 60-second explainer video about [product/topic]. Here’s what it should cover: [insert info]. Make it punchy and clear, with suggested visuals or animations.

description.en: ChatGPT can analyze data, forecast trends, and improve decision-making. Upload data for deeper analysis.
description.zh: ChatGPT分析数据、预测趋势并改善决策。上传数据以进行更深入的分析。

useCase.zh: 识别表现最佳的营销渠道

prompt.en: Analyze this marketing performance spreadsheet and identify which channels had the highest ROI. The file includes data from Q1–Q2 campaigns across email, social, paid search, and events. Summarize top 3 channels and create a chart showing ROI by channel.
prompt.zh: 分析此营销绩效电子表格并识别哪些渠道的ROI最高。文件包括第1-2季度跨电子邮件、社交、付费搜索和活动的数据。总结前3个渠道并创建按渠道显示ROI的图表。

prompt.en: Review this customer churn dataset and identify common characteristics of churned customers. Use columns like tenure, product usage, and support tickets to group insights. Output a short summary with a chart or table showing top risk factors.
prompt.zh: 审查此客户流失数据集并识别流失客户的共同特征。使用任期、产品使用和支持票等列来分组洞察。输出带图表或表格的简短摘要,显示主要风险因素。

prompt.en: Summarize insights from this post-campaign customer feedback survey. The file includes satisfaction ratings and open-ended responses. Provide a 3-bullet executive summary and a chart of top satisfaction drivers.
prompt.zh: 总结活动后客户反馈调查的洞察。文件包括满意度评分和开放式回答。提供3点执行摘要和显示主要满意度驱动因素的图表。

prompt.en: Use this historical lead volume data from the past 6 quarters to project expected lead volume for the next quarter. Highlight any trends, seasonal patterns, and output a simple forecast chart.
prompt.zh: 使用过去6个季度的历史潜在客户量数据来预测下一季度的预期潜在客户量。突出任何趋势、季节性模式,并输出简单的预测图表。

prompt.en: Based on this spreadsheet of previous campaign spend and returns, recommend a revised budget allocation for next quarter. Focus on maximizing ROI while reducing spend on underperforming channels. Output as a table with new % allocations.
prompt.zh: 基于以前活动支出和回报的电子表格,推荐下一季度的修订预算分配。专注于最大化ROI,同时减少表现不佳渠道的支出。以包含新百分比分配的表格形式输出。

description.en: Focuses on crafting cohesive visual strategies, brand narratives, and creative concepts. Create an image using ChatGPT.
description.zh: 专注于制定连贯的视觉策略、品牌叙事和创意概念。使用ChatGPT创建图像。

useCase.en: Develop a brand style guide outline
useCase.zh: 制定品牌风格指南大纲

prompt.en: Create an outline for a brand style guide for [company/product]. Include sections for typography, color palette, logo usage, tone of voice, imagery style, and do’s/don’ts.
prompt.zh: Create an outline for a brand style guide for [company/product]. Include sections for typography, color palette, logo usage, tone of voice, imagery style, and do’s/don’ts.

prompt.en: Brainstorm 3 visual storytelling concepts for a brand campaign on [theme]. Include a concept name, visual style, and key narrative elements (e.g., story arc, mood, colors).
prompt.zh: 为关于[主题]的品牌活动头脑风暴3个视觉叙事概念。包括概念名称、视觉风格和关键叙事元素(例如故事弧、情绪、颜色)。

prompt.en: Create a moodboard with 4 visuals for our [campaign or brand update]. Theme is [describe theme], and the tone should be [describe tone]. Use photoreal or illustrated style.
prompt.zh: 为[活动或品牌更新]创建包含4个视觉效果的情绪板。主题是[描述主题],语气应该是[描述语气]。使用写实或插画风格。

prompt.en: Review the following marketing assets [insert links/files] and evaluate brand consistency in terms of tone, visuals, and messaging. Provide 3 strengths and 3 gaps with recommendations.
prompt.zh: 审查以下营销资产[插入链接/文件]并从语气、视觉效果和信息角度评估品牌一致性。提供3个优势和3个差距及建议。

prompt.en: Suggest 3 creative directions to refresh our brand identity. Include possible color palettes, typography styles, visual motifs, and tone updates that align with [audience/market shift].
prompt.zh: 建议3个更新品牌识别的创意方向。包括可能的调色板、排版风格、视觉图案和与[受众/市场转变]一致的语气更新。

prompt.en: Develop a marketing campaign strategy for [product/service/goal]. Include target audience, key messages, channel mix, content plan, timeline, budget allocation, and success metrics.
prompt.zh: 为[产品/服务/目标]制定营销活动策略。包括目标受众、关键信息、渠道组合、内容计划、时间表、预算分配和成功指标。

prompt.en: Create [number] social media posts for [platform] about [topic]. Match platform best practices, include engaging hooks, relevant hashtags, and clear calls-to-action. Optimize for [goal].
prompt.zh: 为[平台]创建[数量]条关于[主题]的社交媒体帖子。匹配平台最佳实践,包括引人入胜的开头、相关标签和明确的行动号召。针对[目标]进行优化。

prompt.en: Create detailed buyer personas for [product/service]. Include demographics, psychographics, pain points, goals, buying behavior, decision criteria, and preferred communication channels.
prompt.zh: 为[产品/服务]创建详细的买家画像。包括人口统计、心理特征、痛点、目标、购买行为、决策标准和首选沟通渠道。

prompt.en: Analyze our conversion funnel: [provide data/stages]. Identify drop-off points, suggest improvements for each stage, recommend A/B tests, and project impact of optimizations.
prompt.zh: 分析我们的转化漏斗:[提供数据/阶段]。识别流失点,为每个阶段建议改进,推荐A/B测试,并预测优化的影响。

prompt.en: Create a content calendar for [period/channel]. Include content themes, topics, formats, publication schedule, promotion strategy, and alignment with campaigns and seasonal opportunities.
prompt.zh: 为[期间/渠道]创建内容日历。包括内容主题、话题、格式、发布时间表、推广策略以及与活动和季节性机会的一致性。

prompt.en: Create an email nurture sequence for [audience/goal]. Include [number] emails with compelling subject lines, valuable content, progressive engagement, and strategic CTAs. Define timing between emails.
prompt.zh: 为[受众/目标]创建电子邮件培育序列。包括[数量]封电子邮件,带有引人注目的主题行、有价值的内容、渐进式参与和战略性行动号召。定义电子邮件之间的时间间隔。

prompt.en: Conduct competitive marketing analysis for [competitors]. Evaluate their positioning, messaging, channels, content strategy, campaign tactics, and identify gaps or opportunities for differentiation.
prompt.zh: 对[竞争对手]进行竞争性营销分析。评估他们的定位、信息传递、渠道、内容策略、活动策略,并识别差异化的差距或机会。

prompt.en: Develop brand messaging framework for [company/product]. Include brand positioning, value proposition, key messages, differentiators, tone of voice, and messaging hierarchy for different audiences.
prompt.zh: 为[公司/产品]开发品牌信息框架。包括品牌定位、价值主张、关键信息、差异化因素、语气和不同受众的信息层次。

prompt.en: Create a go-to-market plan for launching [product]. Include pre-launch activities, launch event, announcement strategy, channel activation, partner enablement, and post-launch momentum tactics.
prompt.zh: 为发布[产品]创建上市计划。包括预发布活动、发布事件、公告策略、渠道激活、合作伙伴赋能和发布后动力策略。

prompt.en: Develop SEO strategy for [website/content area]. Include keyword research priorities, on-page optimization, content gaps, technical SEO improvements, link building approach, and measurement plan.
prompt.zh: 为[网站/内容领域]制定SEO策略。包括关键词研究优先级、页面优化、内容差距、技术SEO改进、链接建设方法和衡量计划。

prompt.en: Map the customer journey for [persona/product]. Identify touchpoints, emotions, pain points, and opportunities at each stage: awareness, consideration, decision, retention, advocacy.
prompt.zh: 为[用户画像/产品]绘制客户旅程图。识别每个阶段的接触点、情绪、痛点和机会:认知、考虑、决策、保留、倡导。

prompt.en: Develop marketing budget for [period]. Allocate across channels, campaigns, tools, and headcount. Justify investments based on expected ROI, strategic priorities, and historical performance.
prompt.zh: 为[期间]制定营销预算。在渠道、活动、工具和人员之间分配。基于预期投资回报率、战略优先级和历史表现证明投资的合理性。

prompt.en: Write a press release for [announcement]. Follow standard format with compelling headline, strong lead paragraph, supporting quotes, key facts, boilerplate, and media contact information.
prompt.zh: 为[公告]撰写新闻稿。遵循标准格式,包括引人注目的标题、有力的导语段落、支持性引述、关键事实、样板文字和媒体联系信息。

prompt.en: Create event marketing plan for [event type/name]. Include promotion timeline, channel strategy, attendee targeting, engagement tactics, sponsorship activation, and success measurement.
prompt.zh: 为[活动类型/名称]创建活动营销计划。包括推广时间表、渠道策略、参与者定位、参与策略、赞助激活和成功衡量。

prompt.en: Analyze performance of [campaign]: [provide metrics]. Assess against objectives, identify successful elements and underperformers, extract learnings, and recommend optimizations or future approach.
prompt.zh: 分析[营销活动]的表现:[提供指标]。根据目标进行评估,识别成功元素和表现不佳的部分,提取经验教训,并建议优化或未来方法。

prompt.en: Create partnership marketing strategy for [business goal]. Identify ideal partners, define value exchange, outline co-marketing opportunities, establish success metrics, and create outreach plan.
prompt.zh: 为[业务目标]创建合作伙伴营销策略。识别理想合作伙伴,定义价值交换,概述共同营销机会,建立成功指标,并创建外联计划。

prompt.en: Craft a compelling value proposition for [product/service]. Clearly articulate target customer, problem solved, unique solution, key benefits, and differentiation from alternatives.
prompt.zh: 为[产品/服务]制定引人注目的价值主张。清晰阐明目标客户、解决的问题、独特解决方案、关键优势以及与替代方案的差异化。

prompt.en: Design influencer marketing campaign for [product/goal]. Define influencer criteria, outreach strategy, collaboration models, content guidelines, disclosure requirements, and performance tracking.
prompt.zh: 为[产品/目标]设计影响者营销活动。定义影响者标准、外联策略、合作模式、内容指南、披露要求和绩效跟踪。

prompt.en: Provide recommendations to optimize this landing page: [URL or description]. Evaluate headline, value proposition, CTAs, form friction, trust signals, mobile experience, and load speed.
prompt.zh: 提供优化此着陆页的建议:[URL或描述]。评估标题、价值主张、行动号召、表单摩擦、信任信号、移动体验和加载速度。

prompt.en: Design a customer referral program for [product/service]. Define incentive structure, referral mechanics, promotion strategy, tracking system, program rules, and projected ROI.
prompt.zh: 为[产品/服务]设计客户推荐计划。定义激励结构、推荐机制、推广策略、跟踪系统、计划规则和预计投资回报率。
